text: They definitely dont make them like this anymore, at least not in the US.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats why Scott had his shipped from overseas.
Name: Book 16

text: Despite its age, the limo sported all the modern conveniences many larger and newer limos consider standard.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott had the cars electrical system re-vamped to accommodate a 17 flat screen television, DVD player, and state of the art sound system.
Name: Book 16

text: As a final touch, a cooler and wet bar were added and placed within easy reach of the passenger side seats.
Name: Book 16

text: Neither one of us felt like talking much.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott looked as tired as I felt.
Name: Book 16

text: His battle of wills with Meredith had taken a lot out of him.
Name: Book 16

text: My knee was still throbbing from the abuse I had put it through.
Name: Book 16

text: His driver, also imported from overseas, handled the Xcalibre like a pro.
Name: Book 16

text: He guided the vehicle through the streets of the Bronx and across the Willis Avenue Bridge without incident.
Name: Book 16

text: The steel plates and renovations to the bridge usually made for a bumpy ride.
Name: Book 16

text: Within the confines of the limo, I hardly felt a thing.
Name: Book 16

text: You have to tell him,    Kara says and I do.
Name: Book 16

text: I start off with the easy part, the stuff he already knows.
Name: Book 16

text: It gives me time to frame my thoughts about the rest.
Name: Book 16

text: Its still fresh in my mind and thats what makes it so hard.
Name: Book 16

text: There is no time or distance to shield me from what I saw and felt.
Name: Book 16

text: I tell Scott everything I know and the scope of Merediths plans.
Name: Book 16

text: I even tell him about my memory.
Name: Book 16

text: His expression hardens and I remember my friend is far more dangerous than he appears.
Name: Book 16

text: Like the walking stick locked in the trunk of the limo, he is not to be trifled with.
Name: Book 16

text: We will have to do something about Meredith before he can bugger us.
Name: Book 16

text: I nod in agreement though Im not sure what we can do about him.
Name: Book 16

text: Instead of dropping me off at home, Scott insists I spend the night over at his place.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: Im too tired to argue.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a smart move.
Name: Book 16

text: In my present condition, I wouldnt be able to ward off Meredith or any of his merry men if they decided to pay me a visit.
Name: Book 16

text: Scotts place takes my breath away every time I come here.
Name: Book 16

text: It isnt just the size.
Name: Book 16

text: Theres a raw feeling of luxury and comfort permeating the entire apartment, which would put many four star hotels to shame.
Name: Book 16

text: From the little I have seen of it, his apartment is bigger than most houses.
Name: Book 16

text: There were two kitchens, four bedrooms, five bathrooms, a dining room, study, living room and entertainment room - that I know of.
Name: Book 16

text: The rest of the apartment, Scott considered his private domain.
Name: Book 16

text: I figured it was there he kept most of his toys and did the majority of his research.
Name: Book 16

text: He wastes no time setting me up in one of the guest rooms.
Name: Book 16

text: I waste no time falling asleep.
Name: Book 16

text: It is early afternoon when I wake up.
Name: Book 16

text: I stretch in the bed, unwilling to move more than necessary.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: The all-over body ache coupled with the exquisite agony from my knee makes me feel years older.
Name: Book 16

text: At least it gives me something else to think about.
Name: Book 16

text: It keeps me from rushing out and doing something stupid.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara is there, doing her best to soothe my injuries both mental and physical.
Name: Book 16

text: The more and more I think about my options, I realize there is no way I can leave the city.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant run away from this man.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though it might frustrate his plan, it would be too much like letting him win and I cant do it.
Name: Book 16

text: I reach for the remote control and turn on the television.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott, bless his heart, put me up in one of the guest rooms with a television and private bath.
Name: Book 16

text: He even has a change of clothes laid out for me in one of the chairs.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though Scott had gotten me into this mess, Im not angry with him.
Name: Book 16

text: He had no way to know things would fishtail out of control like this.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes one of the guys in white hats and last night he got me out of a real tight spot.
Name: Book 16

text: There is no doubt in my mind about what would have happened to me if he didnt drop everything to come pull my fat out of the fryer.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: As usual, there is nothing on but entertainment programs, spreading gossip about the rich and famous, and the news.
Name: Book 16

text: I opt for the news, hoping it will distract me from my problems.
Name: Book 16

text: Scotts bodyguard is being sought for questioning.
Name: Book 16

text: Good luck with that one, Hagan is fairly good at avoiding the authorities.
Name: Book 16

text: According to him, hes had centuries of practice.
Name: Book 16

text: Hell lay low till things are cleared up.
Name: Book 16

text: Two bodies are found near Tompkins Square Park in Alphabet City.
Name: Book 16

text: I recognize both of them.
Name: Book 16

text: One is the man I saw Meredith choke the life out of.
Name: Book 16

text: The other is one of his men, the one who fell while chasing me.
Name: Book 16

text: Hell of a medical plan hes got for his troops.
Name: Book 16

text: I have a feeling a third body will turn up later tonight or tomorrow.
Name: Book 16

text: Its description will probably match Merediths bodyguard from the coffee shop.
Name: Book 16

text: The newsman comments on the second victims broken leg and how this is the first time two victims were killed within such a short time span.
Name: Book 16

text: Police are looking for a connection and fear this might mean a rise in activity.
Name: Book 16

text: I toy with the idea of phoning in an anonymous tip.
Name: Book 16

text: It wont do any good.
Name: Book 16

text: With the amount of money and connections at Merediths disposal, someone will warn him and give him enough time to cover his tracks.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats assuming he hasnt done so already.
Name: Book 16

text: Damn him and damn me.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe if I brought back up with me or told someone what I was doing I could have stopped him once and for all.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith is a killer and hes going to keep killing unless someone stops him.
Name: Book 16

text: That someone has to be me.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not about honor or being a hero.
Name: Book 16

text: Its about being able to look at myself in the mirror each morning.
Name: Book 16

text: I have to face this, even if it means risking everything.
Name: Book 16

text: The memory of the boy with the cord and the girl I tried to save rears its ugly head again.
Name: Book 16

text: For a moment, just a moment, I wonder if Kara knew all along and kept it from me.
Name: Book 16

text: No, Im not going down that road.
Name: Book 16

text: Weve been through too much for her to ever hide something like that from me.
Name: Book 16

text: I felt her surprise across the link when the memory surfaced.
Name: Book 16

text: The link doesnt allow for lies.
Name: Book 16

text: You can hide the truth or omit it but we cant lie to one another or hide our feelings.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not going to insult her by even considering she might hide such a thing.
Name: Book 16

text: I trust her and so much more.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith might end up killing me before everything is said and done but he isnt going to tarnish this.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara holds me tight and I murmur Im not going to let him win.
Name: Book 16

text: I know but I dont see how we can stop him.
Name: Book 16

text: I frown at that.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara has a point but something isnt right.
Name: Book 16

text: I look at all the facts and think things through.
Name: Book 16

text: No one, and I mean no one, can break the laws of magic.
Name: Book 16

text: He almost fooled me.
Name: Book 16

text: There is no denying his skill.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes still incredibly dangerous, but he is not all powerful.
Name: Book 16

text: A lot of things make sense now.
Name: Book 16

text: I should have seen it sooner.
Name: Book 16

text: His little performance in the Bronx hammered the point home.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith has been sacrificing people to supplement his magic.
Name: Book 16

text: It explains how he has been able to work his spells so easily.
Name: Book 16

text: With enough extra power, you can cast your spells quicker and easier.
Name: Book 16

text: It also explains why the Bloodstone feels the way that it does.
Name: Book 16

text: I should have seen it sooner but Meredith has had me off balance from the start.
Name: Book 16

text: All those comments about coming full circle and the one who got away were not just Merediths way of having some fun at my expense.
Name: Book 16

text: He used them to confuse me and keep my attention focused elsewhere.
Name: Book 16

text: So how do I stop him.
Name: Book 16

text: We could leave town.
Name: Book 16

text: It will give you time to attune yourself to the ring,    Kara murmurs.
Name: Book 16

text: That would be the easy way out.
Name: Book 16

text: I slink away and hide under a rock somewhere while Meredith keeps on killing.
Name: Book 16

text: I shake my head.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats not an option.
Name: Book 16

text: It wouldnt stop Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: At best, it might delay him.
Name: Book 16

text: He could always find me by tracking the ring like he did last night.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott or Sol could shield the ring from his spells, but it wouldnt last long enough to do me any good.
Name: Book 16

text: Hell, it might even be what Meredith wants me to do.
Name: Book 16

text: If I run and hide, he could come for me at his leisure.
Name: Book 16

text: I would be alone, away from anyone who might be able to help me.
Name: Book 16

text: Even if I was able to hide, theres nothing to stop Meredith from trying something else.
Name: Book 16

text: No, its better to confront him than run away.
Name: Book 16

text: You hate him, dont you.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont answer Karas question out loud.
Name: Book 16

text: She knows what I am feeling.
Name: Book 16

text: Its one of those mixed blessings.
Name: Book 16

text: There isnt much I can or want to hide from her.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith has brought me down to a whole new level.
Name: Book 16

text: Worse, he almost caused me to doubt the one person who has always been there for me.
Name: Book 16

text: Its something that makes me feel less human and ready to give into the dark impulses we are all susceptible to.
Name: Book 16

text: He has to pay.
Name: Book 16

text: A plan starts to form.
Name: Book 16

text: Its simple yet devious and most of all it will give me the satisfaction of beating Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara listens as I start to outline my plan.
Name: Book 16

text: Its risky but doable in the little time we have.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont like it,    she says.
Name: Book 16

text: That is an understatement.
Name: Book 16

text: Neither do I but hell never see it coming.
Name: Book 16

text: The door to Scotts study is closed so I knock and wait patiently for him answer.
Name: Book 16

text: It doesnt take long for him to admit me.
Name: Book 16

text: The room reminds me of Sols library but on a much smaller scale.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott sits there in his lazy boy reading another one of his novels.
Name: Book 16

text: This one has Doc Savage on the cover.
Name: Book 16

text: He sets it aside as he looks me up and down.
Name: Book 16

text: I must have looked like hell last night.
Name: Book 16

text: I probably still do.
Name: Book 16

text: Well rested and ready for more adventure, I take it.
Name: Book 16

text: I need two favors.
Name: Book 16

text: Why am I not surprised.
Name: Book 16

text: He favors me with one of his enigmatic smiles.
Name: Book 16

text: This one lets me know he is willing to forgive me for not saying good morning.
Name: Book 16

text: Do they have something to do with Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: First, I need you to shield the Bloodstone so he cant track it again.
Name: Book 16

text: That will be easy enough to do.
Name: Book 16

text: And what is the second favor.
Name: Book 16

text: I want you to get Sol, Nerva, and Hagan here.
Name: Book 16

text: Well need them for when we put the move on Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: We both share a laugh at that.
Name: Book 16

text: I hope he is still able to do so when he hears my plan.
Name: Book 16

text: As Scott said, the spell was easy enough to do.
Name: Book 16

text: I can go out without having to worry about Meredith or his goons using magic to track me down.
Name: Book 16

text: I take the opportunity to splurge and spend time with Kara.
Name: Book 16

text: It will give Scott plenty of time to contact the others via messenger.
Name: Book 16

text: Its just after noontime when I arrive at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
Name: Book 16

text: This is a rare treat for Kara.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not one for museums but she loves them.
Name: Book 16

text: I do admit it is more fun to visit them in her company.
Name: Book 16

text: I enjoy Karas commentary more than the sights as I stroll down the halls.
Name: Book 16

text: Shes better than most tour guides when it comes to pointing out this or that about an exhibit.
Name: Book 16

text: As always, my first stop is the Arms and Armor display before moving on to the various art exhibits.
Name: Book 16

text: Each one takes us back to a different time and place while Kara shares a story from some legend or myth she knows.
Name: Book 16

text: The past comes to life around me.
Name: Book 16

text: I quicken my pace slightly as I pass a drawing of a Viking warrior who looks vaguely familiar.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara tells me he was a champion of King Hrolf.
Name: Book 16

text: If I remember right, Hrolf and his champions figure prominently in a number of Scandinavian legends.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe there is something to this immortality business after all.
Name: Book 16

text: Its close to 5 pm when we leave the museum to get a bite to eat and to rest my knee.
Name: Book 16

text: I say 'we' because it feels like Kara is here in the flesh with me.
Name: Book 16

text: I treat us to filet mignon at Mortons.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara likes her steak rare while I like mine well done so we compromise and settle for medium well.
Name: Book 16

text: The steak, like everything else today, is superb.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though I am tempted to have some wine, I decide against it.
Name: Book 16

text: We have much to see and do tonight.
Name: Book 16

text: The streets of the Village call to us.
Name: Book 16

text: We hop from bar to bar sampling the flavor and music of each establishment.
Name: Book 16

text: We listen to sweet sultry jazz in the Blue Note.
Name: Book 16

text: The Bitter End rocks with live music.
Name: Book 16

text: I do a shot with the bartender in Polly Esthers as the sound of the 70s fills the bar.
Name: Book 16

text: And so it goes.
Name: Book 16

text: We visit places we havent been to in ages.
Name: Book 16

text: This is the night I wanted to have when this whole mess started.
Name: Book 16

text: Around 1 am, we find a party that has just gone into overdrive.
Name: Book 16

text: It has all the hallmarks of a good time: sex, drugs, music, and alcohol.
Name: Book 16

text: I pass on the drugs and avoid the sex.
Name: Book 16

text: The alcohol and music are more than enough for me.
Name: Book 16

text: I make a few new friends and slip out before the police arrive to shut the party down.
Name: Book 16

text: We end the night in Automatic Slims.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara heads off, wishing me a good night.
Name: Book 16

text: The kiss she leaves me with keeps me smiling long after she has gone to bed or to do whatever it is she does.
Name: Book 16

text: I am just finishing my drink when I hear Nerva behind me.
Name: Book 16

text: I knew I would find you here, she says.
Name: Book 16

text: I glance over my shoulder at her.
Name: Book 16

text: The tight leather outfit brings to mind all of my boyhood fantasies of Emma Peel.
Name: Book 16

text: It takes me a moment to get my mouth working.
Name: Book 16

text: How did you find me.
Name: Book 16

text: I had intentionally avoided any place Hagan or Nerva might be since I wanted this to be me and Karas night out.
Name: Book 16

text: She answers me with a smile and a slight toss of her hair.
Name: Book 16

text: You always end the night here when youre about to do something dangerous.
Name: Book 16

text: There is no point in lying to her.
Name: Book 16

text: She knows my habits too well, almost as well as Kara does.
Name: Book 16

text: She leans close and reminds me I still owe her.
Name: Book 16

text: One drink and thats it, I tell her.
Name: Book 16

text: One drink turns into a couple.
Name: Book 16

text: Afterwards, we head back to Nervas place.
Name: Book 16

text: I may never be known as Saint Albritton but I somehow manage to keep from doing anything that will get Kara mad at me.
Name: Book 16

text: We spend the rest of the night talking.
Name: Book 16

text: It keeps my mind off of what Nerva is probably doing to me.
Name: Book 16

text: I learn Nerva likes to cook.
Name: Book 16

text: Its something she does when shes in the right mood.
Name: Book 16

text: She whips me up a breakfast fit for a king.
Name: Book 16

text: When I offer her one of my pancakes, she laughs and tells me shes already eaten.
Name: Book 16

text: Its 7 am when I leave Nervas flat.
Name: Book 16

text: On the way back to Scotts place, I use my cell phone to call Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: The conversation is short and straight to the point.
Name: Book 16

text: Is your offer still open.
Name: Book 16

text: Its mid-afternoon when everyone arrives.
Name: Book 16

text: I have recovered from my night out on the town.
Name: Book 16

text: As I go over everything I know about Meredith, I glance at each of my friends in turn.
Name: Book 16

text: Before Scott learned about Merediths plans, he considered the mans actions a breach of courtesy and respect.
Name: Book 16

text: Gentlemen do not resort to deceit and violence to achieve their aims.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith was simply a rival who needed to be put in his place.
Name: Book 16

text: Once Scott learned the extent of Merediths plans and what hes been doing, that changed.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith went from being an annoying rival to his antithesis.
Name: Book 16

text: Here was a man who was abusing his power, willing to tear down the world for his own gain.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott felt it was his duty to help stop Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: It is part of the code he lives by, a kind of "Noblesse Oblige".
Name: Book 16

text: Some might call the concept outdated or silly but that is the sort of person that Scott is.
Name: Book 16

text: He believes with wealth, power, and prestige comes a certain amount of responsibility.
Name: Book 16

text: The flipside is that Scott expects a certain amount of respect and courtesy from those around him.
Name: Book 16

text: There are worse codes to live by.
Name: Book 16

text: Hagan cant stop smiling.
Name: Book 16

text: He is looking forward to when the talking stops and the hitting begins.
Name: Book 16

text: First and foremost, Hagan is a warrior.
Name: Book 16

text: He is also my friend.
Name: Book 16

text: Like Scott, he lives by a code.
Name: Book 16

text: For him, this is simple.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes probably wondering why we didnt kick down Merediths door in the first place.
Name: Book 16

text: This man tried to hurt Scott, the person who hired him and his friend.
Name: Book 16

text: He then tried to hurt me, another one of his friends.
Name: Book 16

text: It doesnt matter what his plan is.
Name: Book 16

text: Good and evil, right and wrong dont enter into it.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith tried to harm his friends, he has to pay.
Name: Book 16

text: Loyalty to ones friends is something I can understand.
Name: Book 16

text: Its one reason why we get along so well.
Name: Book 16

text: Sol sits there silent and stone faced.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith hasnt threatened him directly.
Name: Book 16

text: He, more than anyone else here, has a good idea of what will happen if Merediths plan is successful.
Name: Book 16

text: Even more important is how Sol sees the world.
Name: Book 16

text: Certain practices are way out of line.
Name: Book 16

text: For him, it is a matter of right and wrong.
Name: Book 16

text: It is about doing the right thing.
Name: Book 16

text: Like some wizard from a fantasy novel, he is ready to confront what he sees as evil.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith fits the bill perfectly.
Name: Book 16

text: He has to pay.
Name: Book 16

text: It is something the two of us can agree upon.
Name: Book 16

text: The difference is Sol has no qualms about taking out Meredith or anyone else for that matter.
Name: Book 16

text: In his way, he can be as bloodthirsty as Hagan.
Name: Book 16

text: I want Meredith dealt with just as much, probably more than Sol.
Name: Book 16

text: How far am I willing to go.
Name: Book 16

text: The answers surprise me.
Name: Book 16

text: Finally, there is Nerva.
Name: Book 16

text: None of this is fun for her.
Name: Book 16

text: In fact, she looks especially grim when she hears the whole story.
Name: Book 16

text: Of all my friends, I would say she is most complex and hardest to figure out.
Name: Book 16

text: It is easy to forget the beautiful woman in front of me is a predator.
Name: Book 16

text: She didnt have anything against Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though he hurt me, she might not have taken a direct interest in matters unless I asked her for help.
Name: Book 16

text: Now that she knows what is at stake, everything has changed.
Name: Book 16

text: Its become a matter of self preservation.
Name: Book 16

text: If its a question of her or Meredith, you dont need to be a brain scientist or rocket surgeon to know what her answer is going to be.
Name: Book 16

text: It doesnt take long to outline my plan.
Name: Book 16

text: As far as plans go, it isnt much.
Name: Book 16

text: As expected, the only one who likes it is Hagan.
Name: Book 16

text: Everyone else, Kara included, says it is too simple.
Name: Book 16

text: They forget sometimes the simple plans are the best ones.
Name: Book 16

text: A simple plan executed perfectly is far better than a more complex plan that fails.
Name: Book 16

text: Sure, a lot could go wrong.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats true with anything I could come up with on such short notice.
Name: Book 16

text: The strong point of this plan is my friends.
Name: Book 16

text: I know each one will do their part.
Name: Book 16

text: They know as well as I do that there isnt room for failure.
Name: Book 16

text: I trust these people.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott Dorward and Solomon the Wise working magic together, many aspiring sorcerers would kill to see this.
Name: Book 16

text: They are deep into their preparations for tonight.
Name: Book 16

text: A study in contrasting styles, Scotts tailored suit is spotless.
Name: Book 16

text: He chants in Latin and uses complex hand gestures combined with precise movements he has learned from his years of study to forge his part of the spell.
Name: Book 16

text: Sol sits motionless on the carpeted floor in his dark sweats, his shirt stained with a bit of sauce from his meatball parmigian hero.
Name: Book 16

text: His eyes have that far away look of someone who isnt all there as he concentrates on doing his part.
Name: Book 16

text: He draws on his years of experience to guide him in weaving the rest of the spell.
Name: Book 16

text: The only time he speaks is to signal Scott when he is ready for whatever step they need to do next.
Name: Book 16

text: Scotts chant and gestures would change while Sol turns his attention to whatever it is that he is seeing.
Name: Book 16

text: When these two masters work magic together, no one can touch them.
Name: Book 16

text: Scotts knowledge and Sols experience make them the perfect team.
Name: Book 16

text: Next to my job, theirs is the hardest.
Name: Book 16

text: Im relying on them to bend the rules so they can tap into the Bloodstone.
Name: Book 16

text: In theory, Scott thinks it will work while Sol doesnt see a problem with this part of the plan.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva stands close by watching the two men work their magic.
Name: Book 16

text: She smiles in admiration, enjoying the show as if she were watching Jimmy Page and Eric Clapton playing alongside Jimi Hendrix.
Name: Book 16

text: Her senses can better appreciate what Scott and Sol are doing.
Name: Book 16

text: Nervas job is the easiest but no less important.
Name: Book 16

text: Timing will be everything.
Name: Book 16

text: Too soon and everything will fail, too late and it will cost me.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats what galls Kara the most about this plan, relying on Nerva.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara is a good judge of character but her vision is clouded concerning the vampire.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe its jealousy or something else.
Name: Book 16

text: It doesnt matter how many times I refuse Nervas invitations to party, maybe its the temptation.
Name: Book 16

text: In comparison, the moment and what the two sorcerers are doing seems to be lost on Hagan.
Name: Book 16

text: The big guy just sits there sharpening his sword.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know how he is going to get away with carrying a sword around with him in the middle of the city.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats not my problem.
Name: Book 16

text: Hagan wouldnt bring it if he thought it would get in the way.
Name: Book 16

text: It takes a certain type of person to thrust a length of steel into a living breathing person or to use it to slash apart someone.
Name: Book 16

text: Its the sort of thing you would expect from a red handed Viking.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though I can use a sword, I dont have a love for the blade or bloodshed.
Name: Book 16

text: This is what Hagan does, what he lives for and hes welcome to it.
Name: Book 16

text: I glance at my four friends then turn my thoughts inward to spend the time with Kara.
Name: Book 16

text: We relive the past and some of our adventures.
Name: Book 16

text: Its another one of those things we do when I knowingly flirt with danger.
Name: Book 16

text: It focuses me and gives me my edge.
Name: Book 16

text: Its the same edge all professionals have over amateurs.
Name: Book 16

text: There is a big difference in how you perform when something is just a hobby or for fun and when its your job or life on the line.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats why the pros are so good at what they do.
Name: Book 16

text: I have no desire to die and Im going to do everything in my power to make sure its not going to happen.
Name: Book 16

text: There are still things I want to see and do.
Name: Book 16

text: Memories of past adventures steel me for what lies ahead.
Name: Book 16

text: As I said, my job will be the hardest.
Name: Book 16

text: I get to take care of Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: It is after midnight.
Name: Book 16

text: Tompkins Square Park is closed.
Name: Book 16

text: Many consider this historic place, the heart of Alphabet City.
Name: Book 16

text: It has been marked by as many concerts as there have been riots.
Name: Book 16

text: During the day, the elm trees and playgrounds provide a welcome change from the busy city streets.
Name: Book 16

text: It is a place where you can walk your dog, people watch or play with your kids.
Name: Book 16

text: At night, the park changes for the worse.
Name: Book 16

text: Though it is no longer a safe haven for criminals and the homeless, it is not the sort of place you want to be in after closing, especially when there is a killer on the loose.
Name: Book 16

text: True to his word, Meredith is there waiting for me.
Name: Book 16

text: There are no police watching the park.
Name: Book 16

text: He said he would come alone.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not stupid enough to believe him.
Name: Book 16

text: His people are somewhere close, ready to come to his aid at a moments notice.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont bother looking for them.
Name: Book 16

text: They arent my problem.
Name: Book 16

text: I look at Meredith in the dim light.
Name: Book 16

text: There are very few people I have ever cared enough to hate.
Name: Book 16

text: He has made that very short and exclusive list.
Name: Book 16

text: His dream dies tonight, whether he does as well is up to him.
Name: Book 16

text: Albritton, His new smile looks almost like the old one except the center tooth is a bit too white.
Name: Book 16

text: Someone not looking might not notice it.
Name: Book 16

text: Despite what he probably considers, my minor accomplishments, I am nothing.
Name: Book 16

text: He knows I am up to something but he isnt worried.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith is confident there is no way I can beat him.
Name: Book 16

text: He might be right.
Name: Book 16

text: I remove my hands from my pockets.
Name: Book 16

text: As usual, Im unarmed.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith doesnt bother to make sure.
Name: Book 16

text: He thinks he knows me.
Name: Book 16

text: To meet me here and like this, he doesnt know me well enough.
Name: Book 16

text: Still, I go through the motions and play my part.
Name: Book 16

text: You know what I want.
Name: Book 16

text: Of course, He says, enjoying the moment and this quiet darkness.
Name: Book 16

text: The sounds of the city fade away as well as that of the animal life scurrying about the park.
Name: Book 16

text: And what happens when you get your answer.
Name: Book 16

text: I pull out the Bloodstone, letting it catch what little light there is.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara grows even more uneasy, if that is possible.
Name: Book 16

text: At this distance, Meredith might be able to use the ring for a spell instead of just focusing energy into it.
Name: Book 16

text: We both know how this is going down.
Name: Book 16

text: Now tell me the truth.
Name: Book 16

text: He knows how much I want this.
Name: Book 16

text: How much I need to know.
Name: Book 16

text: The seconds tick by all too slowly while I struggle against the urge to attack him now.
Name: Book 16

text: I did try to kill you all those years ago.
Name: Book 16

text: You just got in my way.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a bad habit you picked up from somewhere.
Name: Book 16

text: He favors me with a smile as he reminisces.
Name: Book 16

text: I was young back then, an amateur in so many ways.
Name: Book 16

text: My father taught me the arts, but for all his knowledge he lacked the drive to do what it took to get ahead.
Name: Book 16

text: Me, I had too much drive.
Name: Book 16

text: I moved too fast.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: It caused me to make a mistake with you and the girl.
Name: Book 16

text: My actions frightened my father.
Name: Book 16

text: My mother thought sending me away from the city would change me for the better, while my father wanted to avoid a scandal and the police.
Name: Book 16

text: It was the best thing they could have done for me.
Name: Book 16

text: There, I learned patience and perfected my magic.
Name: Book 16

text: The result is what you see here today.
Name: Book 16

text: A small part of me wonders how someone could be so bent out of shape.
Name: Book 16

text: The larger and more important part of me doesnt care.
Name: Book 16

text: When you get right down to it, Meredith had a choice.
Name: Book 16

text: He had everything; fame, fortune, and most importantly the freedom to choose what he wanted to do with his life.
Name: Book 16

text: A lawyer or a social worker might be able to make excuses.
Name: Book 16

text: They might blame his parents or his environment.
Name: Book 16

text: They could say he is insane and they would be right.
Name: Book 16

text: They will say all this in an effort to avoid the truth.
Name: Book 16

text: People have been hurt.
Name: Book 16

text: Others have been killed and Meredith is responsible.
Name: Book 16

text: No one forced him down this path or made him do any of this.
Name: Book 16

text: This is what he choose and he would do all of this over again without a shred of remorse or guilt.
Name: Book 16

text: There is no turning back now.
Name: Book 16

text: I toss him the Bloodstone.
Name: Book 16

text: I know he has no intention of letting me leave this park alive.
Name: Book 16

text: Either,Ill be the next victim of the Alphabet City Strangler or Merediths fall guy.
Name: Book 16

text: but not before he wrings every bit of life and magic from my corpse.
Name: Book 16

text: I let him enjoy his victory.
Name: Book 16

text: I even say the words hes been expecting me to utter since coming here.
Name: Book 16

text: Youre not getting away with this.
Name: Book 16

text: Im taking you out.
Name: Book 16

text: Its the sort of laugh you reserve for a clown in a circus who is more pathetic than funny.
Name: Book 16

text: You cant beat me, even if I were to indulge you infantile mano a mano heroic fantasies.
Name: Book 16

text: The park is surrounded by my men and you are unarmed, Now, his smile turns nasty.
Name: Book 16

text: Your adventures end tonight, Count.
Name: Book 16

text: Think of it as payment for the tooth that you knocked out.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont bother to check my watch.
Name: Book 16

text: Enough time has passed to get this started.
Name: Book 16

text: Its time to spoil Merediths moment of triumph.
Name: Book 16

text: Your men wont be troubling us.
Name: Book 16

text: Hagan is dealing with them right now, That gets his attention.
Name: Book 16

text: Hagan is no joke and Meredith knows it.
Name: Book 16

text: He has a reputation for being very lethal and good at what he does.
Name: Book 16

text: Merediths men, wherever they are hiding, will be too busy dying to come help him.
Name: Book 16

text: Even better is the look he gives me, part accusing and part disbelief.
Name: Book 16

text: He actually thought I would come alone and without backup.
Name: Book 16

text: Sure, I have a reputation as being a stand up guy and always keeping my word, but Im not stupid.
Name: Book 16

text: Not everything you hear about me is true.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not above cheating and playing dirty when the stakes are this high.
Name: Book 16

text: If Meredith had come alone, Hagan would have stayed out of it.
Name: Book 16

text: His code wont permit him to disrupt a duel or a personal challenge.
Name: Book 16

text: I knew Meredith wouldnt play straight with me.
Name: Book 16

text: In his opinion, I am beneath him.
Name: Book 16

text: A lot of sorcerers think they are above anyone unable or unwilling to use magic.
Name: Book 16

text: They figure anyone who believes in magic and doesnt study the art is stupid.
Name: Book 16

text: Its why I am not friends with many of them.
Name: Book 16

text: In my case, I dont practice sorcery because my own talent interferes with any spells I might try to cast.
Name: Book 16

text: Now, Meredith is angry; it shows in his expression and posture.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes underestimated me but he still isnt worried.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes got the Bloodstone.
Name: Book 16

text: He can use its power.
Name: Book 16

text: I push a few more of his buttons.
Name: Book 16

text: And dont think youll be able to use the Bloodstone, its been shielded against your power.
Name: Book 16

text: You and your friends didnt have enough time to work such a spell.
Name: Book 16

text: There wasnt enough time for a spell like that.
Name: Book 16

text: Instinctively, Meredith draws on the ring as I surge forward.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara whispers a warning to me and I laugh.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know what sort of spell he is trying.
Name: Book 16

text: With the ring backing him up, it will probably be enough to get past my talent.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott and Sol spring my next surprise on him.
Name: Book 16

text: For all Merediths skill, he has been getting by using raw power; power he has gotten from sacrificing people.
Name: Book 16

text: It was all part of his strategy to keep up the pressure.
Name: Book 16

text: This time the strategy backfires on him.
Name: Book 16

text: The problem with relying on brute force is it can make you lazy and sloppy.
Name: Book 16

text: Thanks to Scotts knowledge of counter magic and Sols experience with the First Magics, Meredith falls into my trap.
Name: Book 16

text: My friends magic works through Merediths spell, using it as a conduit to safely tap the rings energy.
Name: Book 16

text: It allows them to release the energy stored within the Bloodstone in a controlled manner.
Name: Book 16

text: Usually there are no visible effects when magic is at work.
Name: Book 16

text: This time my friends dont care if they waste power.
Name: Book 16

text: In fact, the more power wasted the better.
Name: Book 16

text: A cold blue fire erupts from the ring, bathing Meredith and me in its light.
Name: Book 16

text: The grass around me withers and dies from the spell.
Name: Book 16

text: I am unharmed as my friends release the rings stored power and send it skyward.
Name: Book 16

text: It arcs out of sight, heading for Merediths building in the Bronx.
Name: Book 16

text: Sol and Scott didnt know what to use the excess power for.
Name: Book 16

text: I suggested they use it for a little urban renewal.
Name: Book 16

text: When this is all over, Scott will see to sealing up that place up permanently, assuming I am able to do my part.
Name: Book 16

text: I gambled and won.
Name: Book 16

text: If Meredith took the extra time and effort, instead of tapping the Bloodstones power to do things quick and dirty, then things would have gone a lot differently.
Name: Book 16

text: With the ring is drained, it is useless to him.
Name: Book 16

text: It will be days, maybe weeks, before he can build up enough power for the Bloodstone to be a threat.
Name: Book 16

text: By then, it will be too late.
Name: Book 16

text: The only sound in the park is that of two men doing their best to hurt one another.
Name: Book 16

text: This isnt an action movie.
Name: Book 16

text: There is no witty banter or curses, just the sound of breathing and the occasional grunt of pain or explosive exhalation as a blow slips past a guard.
Name: Book 16

text: Even with surprise on my side, he is able to blunt my initial assault.
Name: Book 16

text: For the last few days, hes had his fun.
Name: Book 16

text: He enjoyed dropping hints about our connection and playing his games.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: Now that Ive changed the rules, its time to settle up.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith has had this coming for thirty years and I take it to him.
Name: Book 16

text: To his credit, he steps up to the plate taking what I dish out.
Name: Book 16

text: With each punch and kick, I feel his confidence and arrogance wither.
Name: Book 16

text: I hope its tearing him up inside.
Name: Book 16

text: I match my skill and experience against his strength and power.
Name: Book 16

text: Its his quickness against my ability to second guess him and Karas warnings.
Name: Book 16

text: I stick to the plan and do everything right.
Name: Book 16

text: I use the patterns drummed into me by my teacher and the hard knocks I have taken over the years.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont look for openings, I create them.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith has never been in a fight like this.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes a bully and a killer but not fighter.
Name: Book 16

text: This is a new experience for him, dealing with someone able to fight back.
Name: Book 16

text: Still, he adapts quickly.
Name: Book 16

text: More of his punches and kicks land, forcing me to spend more time defending myself.
Name: Book 16

text: Whoever taught him self- defense was no slouch.
Name: Book 16

text: A little over a minute into the fight, he screams something.
Name: Book 16

text: I shut him up with a viscous knife hand to the throat but I am beginning to tire.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant keep up this pace for too much longer.
Name: Book 16

text: I usually take things slow and easy relying on counter punching instead of an all out attack.
Name: Book 16

text: The injuries from the past few days are sapping my strength and endurance but I need to keep Meredith here until Nerva has done her part.
Name: Book 16

text: I just hope Hagan is clear by then.
Name: Book 16

text: Who knows, I might be able to pull this off without her help.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith is bloody and gasping for breath.
Name: Book 16

text: Then it happens, my right knee buckles.
Name: Book 16

text: Im in trouble and he knows it.
Name: Book 16

text: His hands close on my throat.
Name: Book 16

text: I quickly break the hold before it can solidify into a choke.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant go anywhere.
Name: Book 16

text: Im stuck in front of him.
Name: Book 16

text: I try to jam a thumb into one of his eyes.
Name: Book 16

text: The move is countered.
Name: Book 16

text: For my troubles, Meredith kicks my buckling leg out from under me.
Name: Book 16

text: I manage to break my fall but I still hit the ground hard.
Name: Book 16

text: A kick drives what little air I had left out of my body like it did all those years ago.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith wastes no time.
Name: Book 16

text: He gets down to business.
Name: Book 16

text: If I didnt need surgery before, I will now.
Name: Book 16

text: He stomps down hard on my right knee, almost causing me to pass out.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant salvage this.
Name: Book 16

text: What was once a fight turns into a beating, one that doesnt end until he is sure I can no longer fight back.
Name: Book 16

text: He stands over me, bloody and triumphant.
Name: Book 16

text: His foot toes me to see if there is still some life left in me before he pulls out a length of cord out from his pocket.
Name: Book 16

text: Its probably the same one he used on his other victims; at least I hope it is.
Name: Book 16

text: I told you that you couldnt beat me.
Name: Book 16

text: Where the hell is Nerva.
Name: Book 16

text: I told her timing is everything but I dont see any sign of her or the police.
Name: Book 16

text: She would pick this night to run a little late.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara tries to comfort me but her tears get in the way.
Name: Book 16

text: She doesnt think Im going to make it.
Name: Book 16

text: Im almost out of tricks.
Name: Book 16

text: Dont pass out on me, Albritton.
Name: Book 16

text: I want you awake for this, Meredith gives me a shake to make sure I am still with him.
Name: Book 16

text: You dont know how much you have irked me.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know what annoyed me more; your escape all those years ago or your pitiful efforts to stop the inevitable.
Name: Book 16

text: He kneels down and I feel the cord around my neck.
Name: Book 16

text: The bastard doesnt throttle me yet, he wants this to last.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith cant just kill me, he has to humiliate me and thats fine by me.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes given me time, time that I need and hope.
Name: Book 16

text: Cant you hear them.
Name: Book 16

text: His smile of triumph is replaced first by uncertainty, then fear.
Name: Book 16

text: He doesnt want to believe his ears.
Name: Book 16

text: The police will be here in moments but my part isnt done yet.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith can still get away.
Name: Book 16

text: He could flee into the night with the Bloodstone.
Name: Book 16

text: It hurts to smile.
Name: Book 16

text: I do it anyway as I whisper the words that will drive him over the edge.
Name: Book 16

text: Even if you make it out of the park, Hagan or one of the others will nail you.
Name: Book 16

text: Merediths face turns red with anger.
Name: Book 16

text: He tightens the cord around my neck and I struggle to hold on.
Name: Book 16

text: The night becomes blacker as the police charge into the clearing.
Name: Book 16

text: They dont yell freeze or anything.
Name: Book 16

text: There is the sound of thunder and a flash of lightning.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith falls away from me.
Name: Book 16

text: I can breathe again.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara holds me as I slip the rest of the way into the darkness.
Name: Book 16

text: Before everything goes black, my vision is filled with Nerva looking down at me, better late than never.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats another one you owe me, she says.
Name: Book 16

text: * Midpoint Midpoint{{{1 #  Chapter Fourteen.
Name: Book 16

text: I leave out as much as I can about my friends.
Name: Book 16

text: That was part of the plan, another part of the plan no one was thrilled about.
Name: Book 16

text: Someone had to take the heat.
Name: Book 16

text: I volunteered for the job when I confronted Meredith in the park.
Name: Book 16

text: While I healed, the others scattered to the four winds.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott went back overseas to take care of some business at his familys estate.
Name: Book 16

text: From there, he planned on making arrangements to acquire Merediths property in the Bronx.
Name: Book 16

text: Whatever that thing in the stone is, its too dangerous a loose end not to tie up.
Name: Book 16

text: Still, Scott didnt forget about me.
Name: Book 16

text: He saw it as his duty to look out for me, plan or no plan.
Name: Book 16

text: He is taking care of my hospital bills.
Name: Book 16

text: He also made sure to put one of his attorneys at my disposal just in case.
Name: Book 16

text: Hagan, who has enough legal troubles to last at least a dozen lifetimes, left town.
Name: Book 16

text: Knowing him, he was probably on his way to Philadelphia.
Name: Book 16

text: He had friends there and a lot of good memories.
Name: Book 16

text: Like him, the city was rich in history with many stories to tell.
Name: Book 16

text: Hagan wouldnt be gone long, just long enough for the police to forget about him.
Name: Book 16

text: Sometimes it takes a week, sometimes it would be longer.
Name: Book 16

text: People who arent friends and close associates tend to forget about him.
Name: Book 16

text: Hagan called it a mixed blessing which kept him out of the news and history books.
Name: Book 16

text: For all intents and purposes, Sol dropped off the face of the planet.
Name: Book 16

text: He retreated to the confines of his library, temporarily severing his few ties to the mundane world.
Name: Book 16

text: It was already difficult to contact him.
Name: Book 16

text: Now, it was almost impossible.
Name: Book 16

text: Sol had the least to fear from the authorities.
Name: Book 16

text: It puzzled me as to why he went into hiding.
Name: Book 16

text: Now, I have a good idea why.
Name: Book 16

text: He figured this wasnt over and was playing it safe.
Name: Book 16

text: You dont get a name like Solomon the Wise by being careless.
Name: Book 16

text: In contrast, Nerva is hiding in plain sight.
Name: Book 16

text: With her powers, she can avoid unwanted attention from the authorities.
Name: Book 16

text: Even if they knew her usual haunts, the police would be hard pressed to catch her.
Name: Book 16

text: She wont make it easy for them or anyone else to get a hold of her.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a matter of self-preservation and Nerva is very good at taking care of herself.
Name: Book 16

text: Hopefully, I wont need to reach her or Sol for a while.
Name: Book 16

text: My visitors move away from the bedside to converse.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: Time seems to slow to a crawl as I study them.
Name: Book 16

text: Something has been nagging me since they arrived here.
Name: Book 16

text: Yes, their look and demeanor still scream the word Fed.
Name: Book 16

text: They are returning to my bedside, fanning out to surround me.
Name: Book 16

text: This feels more wrong with each passing second.
Name: Book 16

text: I realize I havent seen them flash one bit of identification.
Name: Book 16

text: The medication Im on is definitely me throwing me off.
Name: Book 16

text: Marinos voice is calm and almost reassuring but not quite.
Name: Book 16

text: We believe your story.
Name: Book 16

text: We need to transfer you to someplace more secure and bring you up to speed.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not safe here.
Name: Book 16

text: I am about to ask for some ID when I feel a sense of pressure against my arm.
Name: Book 16

text: I look to the side to see Marinos doctor inject something into my IV tube.
Name: Book 16

text: The other man holds me down before I can yank the tube out.
Name: Book 16

text: He doesnt even try to be gentle about it.
Name: Book 16

text: Youre not with the FBI.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know whether they laugh or not.
Name: Book 16

text: I am more interested in how pretty the room looks when it spins in time to the theme song from the Tonight Show.
Name: Book 16

text: I stop delaying the inevitable and open my eyes.
Name: Book 16

text: There is something disturbing about waking up someplace other than where you fell asleep.
Name: Book 16

text: Its even more disturbing when youve been knocked unconscious.
Name: Book 16

text: Its happened to me more times than I would have liked.
Name: Book 16

text: Its something I will never get used to.
Name: Book 16

text: I never consider it a good thing.
Name: Book 16

text: This time is no different.
Name: Book 16

text: My surroundings are a step up from what I was expecting or imagining.
Name: Book 16

text: The room has a warm and cozy feeling to it.
Name: Book 16

text: There are no bars on the window to clash with the wood furnishings.
Name: Book 16

text: Instead, each window is outfitted with latest in home security and child safety devices.
Name: Book 16

text: They can open just enough to let fresh air into the room, but not enough for a child to get through unless the window is broken.
Name: Book 16

text: In which case, an alarm will sound summoning my hosts and lord knows who else.
Name: Book 16

text: That makes me feel better.
Name: Book 16

text: She has almost as many questions as I do.
Name: Book 16

text: This isnt what she was expecting when she told me I would be free soon.
Name: Book 16

text: I catch her up to date as I find some clothes to wear.
Name: Book 16

text: They arent mine but they are just the sort of thing I would wear, jeans and a t-shirt.
Name: Book 16

text: Whoever my hosts are, they are thorough.
Name: Book 16

text: Not only did they get my size right, there is also a brace for my knee.
Name: Book 16

text: Are they with the man who attacked you.
Name: Book 16

text: No, cause Im still alive.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara nods in agreement.
Name: Book 16

text: If they were with the man who tried to kill me, they could have finished me in the hospital.
Name: Book 16

text: That doesnt make them friends.
Name: Book 16

text: The man who attacked you was surrounded by a glamour.
Name: Book 16

text: I frown at this latest revelation.
Name: Book 16

text: Only the Fae and their descendants can use that style of magic.
Name: Book 16

text: What do they have to do with this.
Name: Book 16

text: The last time I checked, I was on good terms with both of the Fae courts.
Name: Book 16

text: Well, thats something.
Name: Book 16

text: I would feel better if I knew more, like who my hosts are and why Im here.
Name: Book 16

text: The knee brace looks simple to put on and adjust.
Name: Book 16

text: I get dressed and fasten the thing on, testing it out.
Name: Book 16

text: The pain is still there but nowhere near as bad as it was before.
Name: Book 16

text: I might be able to get by without having to resort to the aluminum crutches that sit in the corner of the room.
Name: Book 16

text: I nearly fall down making my way over to them when Marino enters the room.
Name: Book 16

text: She is carrying a wooden tray with what smells like breakfast.
Name: Book 16

text: Good morning, Mr.
Name: Book 16

text: Albritton She says.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino seems pleased with herself.
Name: Book 16

text: I am right where she wants me to be.
Name: Book 16

text: Whoever she works for must have some pull to get me out of the hospital.
Name: Book 16

text: I focus on the woman ignoring my hunger.
Name: Book 16

text: The labels that immediately come to mind are pretty and athletic.
Name: Book 16

text: After her little act in the hospital, I add smart and clever to the list.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino also looks a lot more relaxed and at ease than she was the last time I saw her.
Name: Book 16

text: I imagine this is less stressful than waltzing into my hospital room under false pretenses and kidnapping me.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont make it easy for her.
Name: Book 16

text: I give her the silent treatment while Kara checks her out.
Name: Book 16

text: Shes not enchanted.
Name: Book 16

text: Shes not a sorceress or one of the Fae.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino sets down the tray on a table near one of the windows.
Name: Book 16

text: I know this must be hard for you.
Name: Book 16

text: We had to take you into protective custody.
Name: Book 16

text: Is that what they call kidnapping these days.
Name: Book 16

text: The promise of food lures me closer.
Name: Book 16

text: It smells delicious but it doesnt solve my problem.
Name: Book 16

text: How do you deal with someone who kidnaps you.
Name: Book 16

text: I could shout and scream but it wont get me anywhere.
Name: Book 16

text: So I force myself to be reasonable, and fail.
Name: Book 16

text: Where do people get this stuff from.
Name: Book 16

text: Oh wait, it was for my own good.
Name: Book 16

text: Im sorry but there is a lot at stake.
Name: Book 16

text: You wouldnt have come willingly if we told you who we were, she says.
Name: Book 16

text: Lady, after the story I told you and your friends there isnt a lot that I could call implausible.
Name: Book 16

text: It cant be worse than anything Ive seen, done, or said.
Name: Book 16

text: It begins to dawn on her just how silly this whole situation is.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino lets her guard down and for the first time, I catch a glimpse of her true smile.
Name: Book 16

text: She stops just short of laughing.
Name: Book 16

text: It seems like something you might see in the movies.
Name: Book 16

text: She gestures to one of the chairs at the table before sitting down.
Name: Book 16

text: Okay, lets start from the beginning.
Name: Book 16

text: My name is Jennifer Marino and Im with the government.
Name: Book 16

text: That narrows it down.
Name: Book 16

text: You probably never heard of it.
Name: Book 16

text: Im with the Defense Intelligence Agency.
Name: Book 16

text: I have heard of it.
Name: Book 16

text: Who said you couldnt learn anything from a game of strip Trivia Pursuit.
Name: Book 16

text: Yes, its as bad as it sounds.
Name: Book 16

text: The only reason why I remember this bit of trivia is because I got the answer wrong.
Name: Book 16

text: After the game, I decided to read up on the DIA.
Name: Book 16

text: What I found out was interesting enough to remember.
Name: Book 16

text: The DIA works hand in hand with the Department of Defense and intelligence communities around the world.
Name: Book 16

text: Its role is much like that of the CIA.
Name: Book 16

text: Unlike the Central Intelligence Agency, they get a lot less press.
Name: Book 16

text: The DIA is a military organization.
Name: Book 16

text: When I hear those stories about men in black who deal with the weird stuff the other agencies wont touch, I think of these guys.
Name: Book 16

text: The organizations symbol laden seal is the sort of thing that would give a conspiracy theorist a woody.
Name: Book 16

text: Its dark background brings to mind the unknown and hidden dangers surrounding us.
Name: Book 16

text: In the foreground, the Earth and a flaming torch beating back the darkness.
Name: Book 16

text: I would have felt better if she said she was with the Vatican.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont quite smile at that.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive actually dealt with the Church on several occasions in my career.
Name: Book 16

text: They have always had more than a passing interest in the occult and supernatural.
Name: Book 16

text: Its something they dont publicize, but I digress.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive heard of you.
Name: Book 16

text: It just raises more questions.
Name: Book 16

text: What is the DIA doing investigating something like this.
Name: Book 16

text: I can think of a few reasons why they might be interested in me and my friends.
Name: Book 16

text: None of them are good.
Name: Book 16

text: I need to know where we fit in.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont interrupt Marino.
Name: Book 16

text: I listen to her carefully, with the ear of a skeptic, alert for some lie or missing detail that will tell me I am being tricked again.
Name: Book 16

text: In the end, I can only stare at the woman as I digest my meal and what she has told me.
Name: Book 16

text: Karas thoughts mirror my own.
Name: Book 16

text: These people are dangerous.
Name: Book 16

text: The DIA is split into several different directorates.
Name: Book 16

text: Her department deploys field agents to gather intelligence and analyze data.
Name: Book 16

text: These agents are assigned to task forces which work hand in hand with United States allies to point out potential threats and, in rare cases, act against them.
Name: Book 16

text: Each task force varied in size.
Name: Book 16

text: The amount of funding and support they received is based on how dangerous a threat might seem to the Director.
Name: Book 16

text: For instance, the task force assigned to deal with nuclear and biological weapons was the largest and most heavily funded one with terrorism as a close second.
Name: Book 16

text: Marinos task force is one of the smallest, as she tells it.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont think anyone in the DIA thought the supernatural was real, much less posed a threat to the world, until two days ago.
Name: Book 16

text: I ask the question, knowing I will probably not like the answer.
Name: Book 16

text: What changed their minds.
Name: Book 16

text: She doesnt answer me, not immediately.
Name: Book 16

text: That brief pause tells me she is going to leave something important out.
Name: Book 16

text: I forgot that you were pretty out of it for the last two days.
Name: Book 16

text: There was an incident, the night you were attacked in the hospital.
Name: Book 16

text: At first, we thought it was the work of terrorists.
Name: Book 16

text: As we investigated, we realized something strange had happened.
Name: Book 16

text: My commanding officer took a special interest when one of our psychics described you and mentioned something about the Seven.
Name: Book 16

text: Oh joy, a psychic fingered me.
Name: Book 16

text: Dealing with psychics is almost as much trouble as trying to get a straight answer out of an oracle or soothsayer.
Name: Book 16

text: They always speak in mumbo jumbo or give cryptic clues that never make sense till all is said and done.
Name: Book 16

text: The only one I trust is Rook and it is seldom I visit her for a reading.
Name: Book 16

text: It will be easier to show you.
Name: Book 16

text: A picture is worth a thousand words.
Name: Book 16

text: It tells the story far better than Marino could do with mere words.
Name: Book 16

text: I watch the recording again.
Name: Book 16

text: This time I pay more attention to the little things.
Name: Book 16

text: No one, except for me and my friends, knew why the building collapsed.
Name: Book 16

text: With or without Merediths arrest, there was going to be an investigation.
Name: Book 16

text: The light show Scott and Sol created saw to that.
Name: Book 16

text: It was something I didnt take into account when I asked them to level the place.
Name: Book 16

text: Moments after the city engineers entered what was left of the building, there was an explosion.
Name: Book 16

text: When the first camera got on the scene, it was in time to capture the worst of the tragedy.
Name: Book 16

text: The thick ash grey cloud that was seemingly dispersing on the wind had flooded the neighborhood.
Name: Book 16

text: It only covered a three block radius but the casualty reports were still coming in.
Name: Book 16

text: The news called it an accident involving some sort of biological or chemical agent.
Name: Book 16

text: The coroner was still working on the cause of death.
Name: Book 16

text: The mystery helped fuel the panic which now gripped the city.
Name: Book 16

text: The common theory was Meredith was stockpiling some sort aerosol-based weapon within the building for terrorists.
Name: Book 16

text: The truth is a lot more frightening.
Name: Book 16

text: That cloud is some kind of elemental.
Name: Book 16

text: From Marinos expression, she doesnt know what Im talking about.
Name: Book 16

text: This is all going to be new for her.
Name: Book 16

text: Hell of a time for a crash course in this sort of thing.
Name: Book 16

text: An elemental is a spirit that is associated with one of the seven elements: fire, earth, air, water, mind, wood and metal.
Name: Book 16

text: Their power and sentience varies.
Name: Book 16

text: That one is very big, bigger than any I ever heard of.
Name: Book 16

text: Its more than a little dangerous.
Name: Book 16

text: That was why it was imprisoned in the Stone.
Name: Book 16

text: It is what we call a Servitor.
Name: Book 16

text: As Marino gets a handle on this new bit of information, I cope with my own revelation.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont need Kara to tell me why its called a Servitor.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not hard to guess why.
Name: Book 16

text: What I dont understand is why Kara didnt tell me this in the first place.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe its my own fault for not asking for details after we encountered the thing.
Name: Book 16

text: I try to keep the anger out of my thoughts but, thats impossible.
Name: Book 16

text: How the hell did it get loose.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe the building collapse weakened its prison.
Name: Book 16

text: It could have been anything.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino is looking at me oddly, as if she is wondering if I am daydreaming.
Name: Book 16

text: I blurt out something to avoid looking like a crazy person.
Name: Book 16

text: So, you want my help.
Name: Book 16

text: Before Marino can start laying out all the reasons why I should help, I blunder onward.
Name: Book 16

text: It will save time.
Name: Book 16

text: I was committed the moment she showed me the video.
Name: Book 16

text: All right, I just need a few things.
Name: Book 16

text: Her expression changes slightly, becoming guarded, almost hostile.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino must think I am about to ask for money.
Name: Book 16

text: I need you to keep the police off my back.
Name: Book 16

text: Im useless without freedom to operate.
Name: Book 16

text: If you can do that and level with me then it should be smooth sailing.
Name: Book 16

text: Ill have to check with my superiors but I dont think there will be any issues.
Name: Book 16

text: Just one more thing, I need my ring back.
Name: Book 16

text: She thinks about it before answering.
Name: Book 16

text: That might be a problem but Ill see what I can do.
Name: Book 16

text: Im sure it will be a problem.
Name: Book 16

text: After all, it was last on Merediths person.
Name: Book 16

text: The police are probably holding it as evidence especially after my brief statement.
Name: Book 16

text: I had told the police he took the ring from me.
Name: Book 16

text: It was the only thing I could think of to explain how my fingerprints got on it.
Name: Book 16

text: The explanation was close enough to the truth and I wasnt questioned too much about it.
Name: Book 16

text: To the authorities, there was nothing special about the Bloodstone.
Name: Book 16

text: With that elemental or Servitor free, I will feel safer with the ring in my possession.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara echoes the sentiment.
Name: Book 16

text: You will need it.
Name: Book 16

text: I need to do a few things today.
Name: Book 16

text: Will you be okay without me for a few hours.
Name: Book 16

text: I nod to Kara.
Name: Book 16

text: She is gone without another word.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive always trusted her but the past week has put a strain on our relationship.
Name: Book 16

text: She is holding out on me.
Name: Book 16

text: I can feel it.
Name: Book 16

text: Theres a lot she isnt telling me and its putting me on edge.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe, the break will do us both some good.
Name: Book 16

text: After breakfast, I have the house all to myself.
Name: Book 16

text: It gives me time to explore my new surroundings.
Name: Book 16

text: The crutches and knee brace turn the tour into an adventure.
Name: Book 16

text: The stairs become a treacherous mountain to descend.
Name: Book 16

text: Im breathing hard by the time I reach the safety of the hardwood floor below.
Name: Book 16

text: The house is well furnished.
Name: Book 16

text: On the surface it seems perfect.
Name: Book 16

text: When you look a little deeper, the place lacks the little things that make it a home.
Name: Book 16

text: Its just a roof over your head.
Name: Book 16

text: I have no complaints.
Name: Book 16

text: Its far better than my hospital room.
Name: Book 16

text: During my tour, I find one of the rooms has been outfitted as a conference room while two others have been set up as offices.
Name: Book 16

text: A glance at the cable bill gives me the address.
Name: Book 16

text: The house is somewhere in Scarsdale, a beautiful place that represents the best and worst of the suburbs.
Name: Book 16

text: Scarsdale with its Tudor architecture has an upscale feel to it.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont come out here much even though it is within easy reach of city by car or mass transit.
Name: Book 16

text: It isnt my sort of place.
Name: Book 16

text: Im more comfortable in the city, any city.
Name: Book 16

text: Each one is unique with its own look and style yet they all feel just as alive to me as the wilderness.
Name: Book 16

text: I find myself missing the familiar pulse and beat of New York while I think about what to do.
Name: Book 16

text: Like any living thing, cities can die, and with the Servitor loose I can see that happening all too clearly.
Name: Book 16

text: It is late afternoon when Marino returns.
Name: Book 16

text: She doesnt have the Bloodstone but she does have some good news for me.
Name: Book 16

text: Its safe to move you back into the city.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: I can tell from the set of her shoulders something is bothering her.
Name: Book 16

text: She had been relaxed yesterday, now the tension I saw in the hospital grips her again.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not at liberty to say.
Name: Book 16

text: I frown at that.
Name: Book 16

text: What happened to playing it straight.
Name: Book 16

text: Weve found someone else who can help us.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe her superiors think this person would be more helpful than me.
Name: Book 16

text: It would explain why they were cutting me loose.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant imagine who they could have gotten.
Name: Book 16

text: Any of the so-called experts in the field were liable to make things worse until they realized what they were dealing with.
Name: Book 16

text: Another matter for concern is my own hide.
Name: Book 16

text: If Marino is wrong about it being safe, I could wind up back in the hospital or worse.
Name: Book 16

text: Its something Im not happy about but its out of my hands.
Name: Book 16

text: Listen, Ill give you my card in case you need anything.
Name: Book 16

text: If our expert doesnt work out, well be in contact with you.
Name: Book 16

text: Assuming some maniac doesnt put me in a pine box.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive even arranged for some extra security around your building, just in case.
Name: Book 16

text: Ill pick you up tomorrow morning.
Name: Book 16

text: The dream isnt a pleasant one.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant even remember what it was about but I am relieved when it is rudely interrupted.
Name: Book 16

text: I find myself standing in Scotts study.
Name: Book 16

text: It looks the same as the last time I saw it.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott sits in his lazy boy, ready to apologize for invading my dreams but he doesnt.
Name: Book 16

text: He opens his mouth and then closes it, his attention riveted on something behind me.
Name: Book 16

text: I spin rapidly, remembering my last visitation, only to be greeted by Karas smile.
Name: Book 16

text: Dream sendings are usually private affairs, by invitation only, so its only natural for him to be surprised by Karas presence.
Name: Book 16

text: Tall and statuesque, she is a vision come to life.
Name: Book 16

text: My dark haired angel is as beautiful as when I first met her.
Name: Book 16

text: I forget about Scott and step into her arms.
Name: Book 16

text: Its been too long since we were last together.
Name: Book 16

text: Here in the dream, it is like being with her in the flesh.
Name: Book 16

text: A throat clearing noise from Scott reminds me that he is here, watching the two of us.
Name: Book 16

text: It looks like we will have to get reacquainted later so I behave myself.
Name: Book 16

text: I turn back to our host though my hand finds Karas as I make the proper introductions.
Name: Book 16

text: Allow me to introduce you to my guardian angel, Kara.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara curtseys to Scott who has regained his composure.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not sure whether he is admiring or appraising her.
Name: Book 16

text: It makes me understand how she feels when Im around Nerva.
Name: Book 16

text: When Count said that he had a guardian angel looking over his shoulder, I thought he meant figuratively, not literally.
Name: Book 16

text: I am glad to finally make your acquaintance.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara flashes Scott a brilliant smile.
Name: Book 16

text: Likewise, it is seldom that I get to talk to any of Counts friends.
Name: Book 16

text: After his last dreaming, I am being extra vigilant.
Name: Book 16

text: Ah, so thats why she is here with us.
Name: Book 16

text: She didnt want a repeat performance of my last dream sending.
Name: Book 16

text: I wonder if Scott can set up something like this with just me and her.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara tries to hide the sudden blush that rises to her cheeks as she says softly, Count, please.
Name: Book 16

text: You know that, dont you, Kara says.
Name: Book 16

text: I can feel the warmth in her voice.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a good feeling.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott shakes his head, marveling at the two of us.
Name: Book 16

text: The old boy must keep you hopping.
Name: Book 16

text: He is always getting into something.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a full time job looking out for him, she says.
Name: Book 16

text: Well, youve done a fine job with this troublemaker.
Name: Book 16

text: Its time to put a stop to this before it gets out of hand.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott, you didnt set this up to just chitchat.
Name: Book 16

text: There isnt much time and things have gone astray.
Name: Book 16

text: When I heard about the attempt on your life and the incident in the Bronx, I tried to return to the States but Immigration is being problematic.
Name: Book 16

text: I will be there as soon as I am able.
Name: Book 16

text: I frown and Kara knows what Im thinking.
Name: Book 16

text: Someone with a lot of pull, probably my new friends or whoever tried to kill me, doesnt want Scott around.
Name: Book 16

text: I need to ask Marino about that, assuming she will tell me the truth.
Name: Book 16

text: I bring him up to date on whats been happening with me.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott isnt happy when he learns about the DIA and the fact they might be causing him trouble.
Name: Book 16

text: Yes, please talk with your friends.
Name: Book 16

text: I would like to know who to thank for my current misfortune.
Name: Book 16

text: There isnt much I can do from here and Solomon is incommunicado.
Name: Book 16

text: That is why I am contacting you.
Name: Book 16

text: He met with our fellow mages and others in the community.
Name: Book 16

text: It seems Merediths actions have given them pause.
Name: Book 16

text: They have agreed to give him no aid or comfort.
Name: Book 16

text: Nothing is ever this easy.
Name: Book 16

text: If everything was fine, Scott wouldnt have contacted me like this.
Name: Book 16

text: He would have used a courier or sent a letter.
Name: Book 16

text: He doesnt waste time dropping the other shoe.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: Unfortunately, another problem has come to Solomons attention.
Name: Book 16

text: He is taking a direct hand in the matter.
Name: Book 16

text: Karas smile is still present but slightly less dazzling.
Name: Book 16

text: She doesnt like the sound of this.
Name: Book 16

text: It must be some problem for Sol to get personally involved.
Name: Book 16

text: Before I can ask the obvious question, Scott answers it.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant go into details but it is at least as perilous as the situation with Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe its all connected, Kara says.
Name: Book 16

text: I frown at that.
Name: Book 16

text: The thought had occurred to me.
Name: Book 16

text: Im too paranoid to believe this is all a coincidence.
Name: Book 16

text: Did I overlook something in my rush to take care of Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: I took it for granted he was working alone.
Name: Book 16

text: Its looking more and more likely I was wrong on that score.
Name: Book 16

text: His friends could be the source of this new danger.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott shakes his head.
Name: Book 16

text: Its connected but not like that.
Name: Book 16

text: Lets just say someone sees this crisis as an opportunity to cause mischief.
Name: Book 16

text: He is under the mistaken impression he will be able to attain his own desires while all eyes are on Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: Knowing Sol, he's going to persuade him to abandon his plans.
Name: Book 16

text: Sols methods of persuasion can be as brutal as Hagans, especially if this person is as dangerous as Scott seems to think.
Name: Book 16

text: Is there anything else.
Name: Book 16

text: I did some research and managed to unearth a few things.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not sure if any of it is helpful.
Name: Book 16

text: I am only half listening as Scott rambles on about the book he consulted and what he had to go through to get it.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott is very thorough.
Name: Book 16

text: He tends not to leave out any details no matter how annoying or small.
Name: Book 16

text: When he does make an omission, it is intentional and for a reason.
Name: Book 16

text: For the moment, I focus on Kara.
Name: Book 16

text: Its been a long time since weve been together.
Name: Book 16

text: I let her distract me until Scott gets to the important part.
Name: Book 16

text: When she tenses up, my attention snaps back to the conversation.
Name: Book 16

text: Its good to see that youre paying attention, Count.
Name: Book 16

text: I said the last section of the book is a mixture of prophesy and fact concerning the Seven and their foes.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant make heads or tails of it but as near as I can tell, the Dragons only have one servant at any given time and you are it.
Name: Book 16

text: The rest was gibberish about the Awakening and the Longest Road.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith had mentioned something about the Longest Road to me.
Name: Book 16

text: I wrote it off as another one of his attempts to get under my skin.
Name: Book 16

text: It looks like I was wrong on that score.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not concerned with that as much as the Awakening.
Name: Book 16

text: Whatever it is, it cant be good especially with all the other things I now know about the Seven.
Name: Book 16

text: Dont say another word.
Name: Book 16

text: Karas tone is commanding.
Name: Book 16

text: She delivers the words as if they were a royal decree, one that demands obedience.
Name: Book 16

text: That gives me pause.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive never heard her speak like this before and its a side of her I dont like.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott seems immune to it.
Name: Book 16

text: I guess hes dealt with royalty before.
Name: Book 16

text: His eyes narrow slightly as he looks at the two of us.
Name: Book 16

text: This isnt a safe spot to be in but Im not going to stand aside no matter how ugly this might get.
Name: Book 16

text: His words are clipped and precise.
Name: Book 16

text: Madam, he needs to know this.
Name: Book 16

text: He isnt ready yet, she says.
Name: Book 16

text: I step away from Kara.
Name: Book 16

text: You know, Im right here and I want to know what the hell you two are talking about.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott seems about to answer me when the dream starts to break apart.
Name: Book 16

text: I get a sense of satisfaction from Kara as I sit up in my bed, shaking.
Name: Book 16

text: This is her doing.
Name: Book 16

text: Shes used our link to wake me up from the dream.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara is trying to explain but I dont want to hear it.
Name: Book 16

text: I am too angry for words.
Name: Book 16

text: Molten fury bubbles across our link and Kara is gone.
Name: Book 16

text: In my anger, I think I may have hurt her feelings and the sick part is I wanted to.
Name: Book 16

text: I spend the rest of the night trying to reach Kara and apologize but to no avail.
Name: Book 16

text: Its 8 AM when the alarm rings.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino will be here soon to take me home.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though the painkillers help, my knee is nowhere near 100 percent.
Name: Book 16

text: It would be humiliating to fall and die in the shower because I was in a hurry, so I start getting ready earlier.
Name: Book 16

text: I think back to the dream.
Name: Book 16

text: Unlike most of my dreams, I remember most of it in vivid detail.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott went through a lot of effort to contact me.
Name: Book 16

text: He had to make the spell powerful enough to get past my little talent.
Name: Book 16

text: It will be some time before hell have enough juice to reach me again.
Name: Book 16

text: I think back to what he told me before Kara cut him off.
Name: Book 16
