text: Every few years, the Dragons choose a single champion or servant to act as their agent in the world.
Name: Book 16

text: Each one is different and their roles have varied.
Name: Book 16

text: Some have been warriors and heroes.
Name: Book 16

text: Others have been scholars and artists.
Name: Book 16

text: Their tasks have been great and small but each servant was given three gifts to help them: a weapon, a shield and a guide.
Name: Book 16

text: Sometimes these have been literal, while other times figuratively.
Name: Book 16

text: If thats the case, and I think it is, then my shield is my little talent.
Name: Book 16

text: That would make Kara my guide but I still lack the weapon.
Name: Book 16

text: Will I need one.
Name: Book 16

text: With that Servitor thing on the loose, the answer is yes.
Name: Book 16

text: The other questions come to mind have no easy answers and for the first time in a long time, I have no one to help me answer them or to brainstorm with.
Name: Book 16

text: The Awakening has to deal with the Seven.
Name: Book 16

text: Is there some prophecy out there saying the Seven will awaken no matter what I do.
Name: Book 16

text: And then there is the Longest Road.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith said it leads to death.
Name: Book 16

text: That doesnt tell me what it is and what it has to do with all of this.
Name: Book 16

text: What is Kara hiding from me.
Name: Book 16

text: Getting answers to all my questions isnt my biggest and most pressing concern.
Name: Book 16

text: Neither is the Seven or being some dragons champion.
Name: Book 16

text: Its about Kara and making things right with her.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino is waiting for me outside in her car, a red Honda Accord.
Name: Book 16

text: Its got just enough room for me to stretch out my legs when I push the seat all the way back, turning the trip from an experiment in torture to a mildly unpleasant experience.
Name: Book 16

text: Still, it feels good to be outside.
Name: Book 16

text: The feeling wont last long.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino doesnt drive like Nerva.
Name: Book 16

text: Shes not a bad driver, just a bit too cautious for my tastes.
Name: Book 16

text: For her, it is all about getting from point A to point B, quickly and efficiently.
Name: Book 16

text: The traffic reports on AM radio and her no- nonsense approach help cut down the travel time into the city.
Name: Book 16

text: Soon, we are stuck in traffic on the West Side Highway.
Name: Book 16

text: To be honest, I dont mind the traffic.
Name: Book 16

text: It gives me a chance to talk to Marino and let go of some of my anger.
Name: Book 16

text: It also takes my mind off of the unpleasant possibility I might have to stop this Servitor thing on my own.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know when or if Kara will be back.
Name: Book 16

text: It will take time for Scott to clear things with Immigration.
Name: Book 16

text: Sol is busy dealing with another problem.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva may or may not be helping him.
Name: Book 16

text: If she is, it will make contacting Sol more difficult.
Name: Book 16

text: Then there is Hagan.
Name: Book 16

text: Besides Kara, he is the one I count on the most.
Name: Book 16

text: He has always been there to back me up.
Name: Book 16

text: I know where he is hiding out, but I dont want to call him unless I have to.
Name: Book 16

text: There is no reason to put him in danger no matter how confident he is about avoiding the police.
Name: Book 16

text: I stay away from uncomfortable subjects like politics, religion, and her love life.
Name: Book 16

text: Theyre not any of my business.
Name: Book 16

text: I also steer away from work.
Name: Book 16

text: This isnt the time or place for it.
Name: Book 16

text: It still leaves enough things for us to talk about for me to get a better sense of her.
Name: Book 16

text: We talk about current events, likes and dislikes before swapping travel stories and jokes.
Name: Book 16

text: She knows a lot about me but not who I am so this is a learning experience for her as much as it is for me.
Name: Book 16

text: It only takes me twenty minutes to come to the conclusion she is good people.
Name: Book 16

text: By that I mean, deep down shes a nice person.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not a term I use to describe a lot of people but it fits her.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not one of those guys who use the word nice as a synonym for sucker.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino is anything but that.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though she actually cares about her fellow man, she doesnt take it to an extreme and turn it into a weakness or something that can be exploited.
Name: Book 16

text: I can see why she is involved with the DIA and why they chose her.
Name: Book 16

text: Its hard to find an idealist who knows where to draw the line.
Name: Book 16

text: The best way to sum up all my feelings about her is to say I think we can be friends.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino smiles at me, almost as if she can hear my thoughts.
Name: Book 16

text: I wonder if I blurted out what I was thinking.
Name: Book 16

text: She picks this moment to make the conversation more interesting by popping the question.
Name: Book 16

text: Count, is there someone special.
Name: Book 16

text: That catches me off-guard.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant help but laugh.
Name: Book 16

text: This is what I get for trying to stick to the safe topics.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a fair question but one I dont know how to answer.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a touchy subject right now.
Name: Book 16

text: I havent talked to Kara since our falling out and if I tell Marino the truth, there will be more questions.
Name: Book 16

text: How do you tell someone you hear voices and youre involved with a guardian angel.
Name: Book 16

text: I could lie but that will either raise more questions or cause problems somewhere down the line.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara said I wasnt ready to know whatever it was Scott had to say and here I am thinking the same thing about Marino.
Name: Book 16

text: I want to answer her question but I know she cant handle the answer yet.
Name: Book 16

text: Is it this hard for Kara.
Name: Book 16

text: When we first met, she was a mentor and a teacher.
Name: Book 16

text: As time passed, she became more of a partner and someone I could always rely on to help me.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not the same man I was weeks ago.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith has been like a poison, tainting everything in my life, but its more than that.
Name: Book 16

text: Were both to blame, Ive been pushing and taking chances while Kara has been going into overdrive protecting me.
Name: Book 16

text: Now, look at us.
Name: Book 16

text: Marinos words pull me back into the conversation.
Name: Book 16

text: You dont have to answer.
Name: Book 16

text: I was just curious.
Name: Book 16

text: The file I was given on you lists plenty of associates but no one that you could call a significant other, she says.
Name: Book 16

text: I say but I dont answer the question.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont feel like lying to someone I want to call a friend.
Name: Book 16

text: Instead, we spend the rest of the ride in silence.
Name: Book 16

text: Almost everything is exactly like I left it.
Name: Book 16

text: The dishes have been done and someone went to the effort of tidying things up.
Name: Book 16

text: At a glance, nothing appears to be missing.
Name: Book 16

text: There would be time to check on that later.
Name: Book 16

text: I glance over at Marino as I turn on the TV set.
Name: Book 16

text: We had to make sure it was safe.
Name: Book 16

text: A little cleaning didnt hurt.
Name: Book 16

text: Can I get you something.
Name: Book 16

text: No, thats all right.
Name: Book 16

text: I should be going.
Name: Book 16

text: I have a long drive home.
Name: Book 16

text: Another reason to get some coffee into your system.
Name: Book 16

text: I even have paper cups so you can get it to go.
Name: Book 16

text: Okay, black with two sugars.
Name: Book 16

text: I nod and get to work.
Name: Book 16

text: Im about to ask the same question she caught me with earlier when my attention is drawn to the TV and the news report.
Name: Book 16

text: It takes seconds for the quiet horror to sink in.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith stands there, smiling for the cameras, looking every bit the winner.
Name: Book 16

text: His lawyers and entourage keep the press at bay as he reads a brief statement proclaiming his innocence.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats just the sort of thing he would do after being caught in the act with the murder weapon in hand.
Name: Book 16

text: The hypocrite praises the police for their restraint while I curse them.
Name: Book 16

text: Why the hell hadnt the police finished off that maniac.
Name: Book 16

text: The best case scenario was the police would kill Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: Even if that didnt happen, I figured they would just lock him up and throw away the key.
Name: Book 16

text: I didnt think anyone in their right mind would turn him loose.
Name: Book 16

text: It feels like I havent accomplished a damn thing except get people hurt or killed.
Name: Book 16

text: The only thing I have managed to do is keep the Bloodstone out of his hands.
Name: Book 16

text: What gets me the most is the fact I recognize one member of Merediths entourage.
Name: Book 16

text: He had come with Marino to interview me in the hospital.
Name: Book 16

text: When I get angry, its a cold almost reptilian thing.
Name: Book 16

text: Generally, I dont shout or scream but its something that is easy to see and feel.
Name: Book 16

text: You can pick up the clues in my body language.
Name: Book 16

text: You can see it in my eyes.
Name: Book 16

text: You can hear it in my voice.
Name: Book 16

text: You people cant be serious.
Name: Book 16

text: I was told not to tell you.
Name: Book 16

text: He knows the most about that thing and how to get rid of it.
Name: Book 16

text: My tone drips with venom.
Name: Book 16

text: And you always do what youre told.
Name: Book 16

text: Andrew thought you might do something rash.
Name: Book 16

text: Why is everyone so worried Im going to run out and do something stupid.
Name: Book 16

text: In this case, it might be true, but Im really getting tired of people leaving out important details, especially when Im supposed to be working with them.
Name: Book 16

text: Lady, were you not listening when I told you all the stuff the other day.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes not about to help you or anyone else unless it helps him.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes doing it to keep the death penalty off the table.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino cant believe what she is telling me.
Name: Book 16

text: She has to be smarter than this.
Name: Book 16

text: No, shes repeating what shes been told and hoping it works out for the best.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith is going to screw you guys over.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes got some twisted plan in the works and youre helping him.
Name: Book 16

text: Andrew was afraid of that.
Name: Book 16

text: Andrew has a lot to be afraid of.
Name: Book 16

text: We all do, especially me.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith is going to make another run at me.
Name: Book 16

text: It wasnt Meredith who tried to have you killed in the hospital.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe, just maybe, she knows something I dont.
Name: Book 16

text: Somehow I doubt it, yet I ask the question.
Name: Book 16

text: How do you know.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes been incommunicado since his arrest, recovering from his injuries.
Name: Book 16

text: I throw up my hands in frustration.
Name: Book 16

text: Dont you get it.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith is a sorcerer.
Name: Book 16

text: He could have gotten word to one of his cronies and you would never know it.
Name: Book 16

text: She frowns at me.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino cant see it.
Name: Book 16

text: She isnt a part of this world.
Name: Book 16

text: To her, magic is the stuff you see on TV or in Vegas.
Name: Book 16

text: It isnt real to her.
Name: Book 16

text: Hell, this is new territory for me as well.
Name: Book 16

text: I am dealing with things on a larger scale than I am used to.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont think she agreed with whatever decision came down from on high.
Name: Book 16

text: I decide to push it.
Name: Book 16

text: I bet the whole kidnapping thing was Andrews idea.
Name: Book 16

text: Was it also his idea to keep Scott out of the country.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino is surprised by that.
Name: Book 16

text: Not because she didnt know about Scott but the fact that I knew about it.
Name: Book 16

text: Your friend might interfere with the operation, she says.
Name: Book 16

text: Did Meredith give Andrew that piece of advice.
Name: Book 16

text: She opens her mouth to reply but I interrupt her.
Name: Book 16

text: Andrew is just doing what he thinks is best.
Name: Book 16

text: You know, Meredith said something similar.
Name: Book 16

text: That doesnt make it or him right.
Name: Book 16

text: If he has his way, its all over, not just for you and me but for everyone.
Name: Book 16

text: What happened in the Bronx was just the beginning.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino leaves me to stew in my own juices.
Name: Book 16

text: How could things have gone wrong so fast.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not the pain or stiffness in my leg that awakens me.
Name: Book 16

text: It is something else.
Name: Book 16

text: For a moment, I think this is it but there is no assassin or shadowy figure ready to end my life.
Name: Book 16

text: It takes me a moment to focus on the source of my unease.
Name: Book 16

text: I can sense its presence from across the room.
Name: Book 16

text: The Bloodstone sits on my desk.
Name: Book 16

text: It is empty, devoid of power and energy.
Name: Book 16

text: It lacks the taint and greasy sensation I have come to associate with it.
Name: Book 16

text: The ring looks like any other piece of jewelry but it is no less dangerous.
Name: Book 16

text: If I did not know it so well, I would have sworn it was a fake.
Name: Book 16

text: I slip out of bed and claim my prize.
Name: Book 16

text: After Marinos news, I had given up seeing the ring again.
Name: Book 16

text: I was sure Meredith asked for it as part of his deal with the DIA.
Name: Book 16

text: How did the Bloodstone get here.
Name: Book 16

text: What does this mean.
Name: Book 16

text: The questions keep me from going back to sleep.
Name: Book 16

text: The answers are just out of my reach.
Name: Book 16

text: I have no one to bounce ideas off of.
Name: Book 16

text: All of my friends I would be comfortable talking to about this are not around.
Name: Book 16

text: The only one I have a prayer of reaching is Nerva.
Name: Book 16

text: Shes not the best sounding board but she is good at taking my mind off of my problems.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe thats all I need right now.
Name: Book 16

text: I just hope I can find her before Meredith makes his next move.
Name: Book 16

text: I know it is going to be soon.
Name: Book 16

text: The hard part about visiting the doctors office is the wait.
Name: Book 16

text: No matter how early or late you arrive, you always end up waiting.
Name: Book 16

text: Today, the wait is longer than usual.
Name: Book 16

text: The office is crowded and there is paperwork to fill out.
Name: Book 16

text: I look at some of the other patients and wonder what has brought them here.
Name: Book 16

text: When it comes time to pay for this little visit, I find myself glad Scott is picking up the tab.
Name: Book 16

text: Being a paranormal investigator and in business for myself means I dont have medical coverage.
Name: Book 16

text: The examination is short.
Name: Book 16

text: My knee is coming along nicely.
Name: Book 16

text: The doctor is surprised at the progress I have made since the operation.
Name: Book 16

text: In another week or two, I wont need the crutches.
Name: Book 16

text: That doesnt mean Im in the clear.
Name: Book 16

text: I still need some physical therapy if I want to restore full mobility to my knee.
Name: Book 16

text: He also warns me to take it easy and not overdo things.
Name: Book 16

text: That means using the crutches.
Name: Book 16

text: If I follow his advice, the only thing I might have to worry about is a little arthritis.
Name: Book 16

text: Other than that Ill be able to go back to my usual routine in practically no time.
Name: Book 16

text: All in all, its good news.
Name: Book 16

text: I decide to check up on Nerva.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott would have mentioned if she was also dealing with this new problem.
Name: Book 16

text: More than likely, she has been left to her own devices.
Name: Book 16

text: I take the opportunity to go downtown to her place.
Name: Book 16

text: Whenever I look for Nerva, I almost never start at her apartment.
Name: Book 16

text: I always try to call her on the phone or check the places she likes to hang out in.
Name: Book 16

text: There are two reasons for this.
Name: Book 16

text: In part, it is because I dont think she will be in.
Name: Book 16

text: The other reason is I am afraid she will be at home and either entertaining guests or hungry.
Name: Book 16

text: As usual, there is no answer on Nervas cell phone.
Name: Book 16

text: This time, I leave a message on her voice mail.
Name: Book 16

text: With nothing else to do but wait, I visit all of her usual hangouts.
Name: Book 16

text: There are a lot of them.
Name: Book 16

text: The crutches turn my search into an epic quest.
Name: Book 16

text: Bars and clubs I navigated easily in the past are now complex warrens filled with traps and pitfalls.
Name: Book 16

text: Its close to 2 am when I take a cab to her place.
Name: Book 16

text: I am tired and desperate.
Name: Book 16

text: My heart sinks when I find the door to her apartment is unlocked.
Name: Book 16

text: The interior is dark and foreboding, a far cry from its usual appearance.
Name: Book 16

text: I fear the worst.
Name: Book 16

text: In the dim light, it looks like a tornado or vengeful spirit has struck the place.
Name: Book 16

text: Im still playing catch up.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith is a step ahead of me.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes looking to remove me and my friends from the equation.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott and Sol are already out of the fight and Im just coming up to speed.
Name: Book 16

text: There is nothing I can do here.
Name: Book 16

text: I am about to leave when I hear a noise behind me.
Name: Book 16

text: She stands in the doorway of her apartment as if she had always been there, just waiting for me to turn around.
Name: Book 16

text: Her black leather outfit looks like it was painted onto her tiny figure.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not her usual look but it still takes my breath away.
Name: Book 16

text: It brings to mind images from the comic books and movies.
Name: Book 16

text: I am about to compliment her when she smiles at me.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva has always had a way about her.
Name: Book 16

text: She could turn any man on without ever speaking a word.
Name: Book 16

text: This time, I find myself drawn to her.
Name: Book 16

text: The sirens call would be irresistible if it werent for my particular gift.
Name: Book 16

text: Still, I move forward ignoring the instinct to limp away as fast as I can.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: This is my friend.
Name: Book 16

text: She would never hurt me.
Name: Book 16

text: I am close enough to smell her perfume.
Name: Book 16

text: Its subtle scent reminds me of jasmine.
Name: Book 16

text: Her voice is a breathy whisper.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive been looking for you.
Name: Book 16

text: She continues to smile at me but it no longer holds the promise of a long night of passion.
Name: Book 16

text: There is only murderous intent.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva is going to hurt me and enjoy every minute of it.
Name: Book 16

text: Before I can react to the danger, she attacks.
Name: Book 16

text: A bomb goes off in my midsection; her punch lifts me off of my feet and launches me back into the apartment.
Name: Book 16

text: I lose one of my crutches as I land awkwardly and off balance.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a minor miracle I dont fall to the floor.
Name: Book 16

text: This is not good.
Name: Book 16

text: Even if I was one hundred percent, going toe to toe with a vampire or any other magical creature is something I try to avoid.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva makes it easy to forget she is a vampire.
Name: Book 16

text: Like a cat, shes always on the prowl, ever on the hunt for entertainment, willing to be pampered.
Name: Book 16

text: At heart, she is still a predator.
Name: Book 16

text: Her looks dont make her claws any less dangerous.
Name: Book 16

text: She almost never uses any of her supernatural powers.
Name: Book 16

text: Like everything about her, they are impressive.
Name: Book 16

text: A while back, I asked her about that little quirk.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva said it was too easy and took the fun out of things.
Name: Book 16

text: She preferred to do things the old fashioned way when it came to securing her meals and any number of creature comforts.
Name: Book 16

text: With a laugh, she admitted she liked to play with her food.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though she doesnt drink blood, the idea made me a little uneasy.
Name: Book 16

text: Im going to make you suffer, she growls.
Name: Book 16

text: As barbaric and unchivalrous as it might seem, I have no problem hitting women, especially when they are trying to kill me.
Name: Book 16

text: I do have a problem with hitting my friends and hurting the people I care for.
Name: Book 16

text: I pick up one of my crutches and swing it like Im batting clean up for the Yankees.
Name: Book 16

text: The blow catches her, buying me some time.
Name: Book 16

text: Not much, she recovers rapidly and charges me again.
Name: Book 16

text: I take another swing, hoping for a home run.
Name: Book 16

text: This time she snatches the crutch out of my hands before I can hit her again.
Name: Book 16

text: She tosses the mangled metal contemptuously over her shoulder.
Name: Book 16

text: It gives me a moment to prepare for her next attack.
Name: Book 16

text: When it comes, I parry aside the blow aimed at my face.
Name: Book 16

text: I rely on my training to redirect the force of it and spin her off balance.
Name: Book 16

text: It gives me a chance to grapple her.
Name: Book 16

text: Im talking for my own benefit.
Name: Book 16

text: She doesnt answer me.
Name: Book 16

text: I really didnt expect her to.
Name: Book 16

text: Nothing I can say or do will get through to her.
Name: Book 16

text: Instead, Nerva demonstrates how flexible she is.
Name: Book 16

text: Combined with her strength, it is enough to break my hold.
Name: Book 16

text: I find myself wondering if she can move like that in bed.
Name: Book 16

text: Her next blow powers through my block.
Name: Book 16

text: I fall to my hands and knees, gasping for air.
Name: Book 16

text: Effortlessly, she picks me up by the scruff of my neck.
Name: Book 16

text: I start to say something when she backhands me across the face, once and then a second time.
Name: Book 16

text: The third slap is enough to dim the lights until Nerva shakes me.
Name: Book 16

text: I want you awake for this, Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: That burns away the cobwebs threatening to suffocate me.
Name: Book 16

text: I should have realized what was going on a lot sooner.
Name: Book 16

text: It might have saved me some trouble.
Name: Book 16

text: She thinks Im Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: Someone must have put a spell on her.
Name: Book 16

text: I put that thought and my concerns about her welfare to the side.
Name: Book 16

text: I have to turn this around now or I wont live long enough to feel guilty about hurting her.
Name: Book 16

text: I use my good leg to slam my knee into her side.
Name: Book 16

text: There isnt a lot of power behind the kick but it has the desired effect.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva hurls me away from her.
Name: Book 16

text: I smash into a bookshelf and slump to the floor.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not going anywhere.
Name: Book 16

text: After this short battle, I cant get up without help.
Name: Book 16

text: The cat is almost done playing with her mouse.
Name: Book 16

text: She takes her time coming towards me.
Name: Book 16

text: I use the moment and breathing room to muster my willpower.
Name: Book 16

text: There is only going to be one shot at this.
Name: Book 16

text: I almost never use my gift consciously.
Name: Book 16

text: It works fine on its own, protecting me from magic by directing it elsewhere.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara had said with practice I could use it to affect magic on other people and items.
Name: Book 16

text: I practiced just enough to be able to instinctively protect someone in close proximity of me but never for something like this.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva is almost on me when I get a handle on what I am doing.
Name: Book 16

text: The spells and magic binding her are dispelled violently.
Name: Book 16

text: She stiffens then drops like a puppet whose strings have been cut.
Name: Book 16

text: As Nerva falls on top of me, there is no rush or thrill of victory.
Name: Book 16

text: I just hurt a friend and I dont know how badly.
Name: Book 16

text: I just breathe a sigh of relief that it is over.
Name: Book 16

text: Now, I have another problem.
Name: Book 16

text: Someone must have heard the racket.
Name: Book 16

text: Theyll call the police.
Name: Book 16

text: We both need to be elsewhere but I cant move.
Name: Book 16

text: Nervas beating has taken its toll on me.
Name: Book 16

text: I can only lie there wondering how I will talk my way out of this one.
Name: Book 16

text: Youre lucky my neighbors are used to the noise, Nerva says, Usually there is a lot more screaming and banging.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont feel lucky.
Name: Book 16

text: Everything hurts when I even think about moving.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: Nerva was good enough to help me onto her couch.
Name: Book 16

text: I just relax and try to find a position that is less painful than the last.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a bit unfair.
Name: Book 16

text: I won our little battle and I feel as weak as a kitten.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva is acting like nothing has happened.
Name: Book 16

text: I watch her buzz around the apartment, straightening things up.
Name: Book 16

text: Shouldnt you be taking it easy.
Name: Book 16

text: Im fine, just a little hungry.
Name: Book 16

text: The smile she flashes me is playful.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not going to feed on you.
Name: Book 16

text: You wont make much of a snack with the shape youre in right now.
Name: Book 16

text: You really know how to make me feel better.
Name: Book 16

text: Well, I know a few ways to perk you up.
Name: Book 16

text: Her smile leaves no doubt as to just how she would accomplish that.
Name: Book 16

text: Im begin to feel better until I remember the last time she gave me that smile.
Name: Book 16

text: It was right before she tried to kill me.
Name: Book 16

text: Tell me, did you run into any Fae lately.
Name: Book 16

text: Her expression changes from playful to serious.
Name: Book 16

text: Yes, yes I ran into one the other night.
Name: Book 16

text: There was a Fae at the Batcave.
Name: Book 16

text: His name was Fitzgerald.
Name: Book 16

text: He wanted to arrange a meeting with Sol.
Name: Book 16

text: I've heard of it.
Name: Book 16

text: I didnt realize Nerva hung out there, but it makes sense.
Name: Book 16

text: The place caters to vampires and their guests.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not my sort of place.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though its billed as neutral ground, you could end up paying a lot more than the cover charge if youre not careful.
Name: Book 16

text: Did you do it.
Name: Book 16

text: You know Sols rules.
Name: Book 16

text: No one sees him unless they are vetted and I didnt know this Fitzgerald guy from Adam.
Name: Book 16

text: I focus my thoughts on Fitzgerald.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara had mentioned my attacker had been under a glamour.
Name: Book 16

text: Its one of the ways the Fae use magic.
Name: Book 16

text: Part enchantment, part illusion and part act of creation, the Fae can use glamour to shape the world around them and the perceptions of those around them.
Name: Book 16

text: There are numerous stories about the Fae and their magic.
Name: Book 16

text: Remember Cinderella and how the fairy god mother turned a pumpkin into a carriage.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats a good example of how glamour can be used.
Name: Book 16

text: It is their defense and protection in a world that is getting smaller every day.
Name: Book 16

text: Like most forms of magic, the glamour has little effect on me, allowing me to see through their illusions and resist their enchantments much to the dismay of several Unseelie.
Name: Book 16

text: My talent does have its limit.
Name: Book 16

text: It doesnt protect me from anything created by the glamour.
Name: Book 16

text: A sword forged from a tree limb can still kill m,e as I learned when I first encountered the Fae.
Name: Book 16

text: Also, sufficiently powerful Fae can get by my gift.
Name: Book 16

text: So what did this Fae look like.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes an Unseelie with sharp teeth.
Name: Book 16

text: Youll know him the moment you set eyes on him.
Name: Book 16

text: Nervas description leaves a lot to be desired.
Name: Book 16

text: So does this entire situation.
Name: Book 16

text: Still, I trust her.
Name: Book 16

text: If she says I will know him when I see him, I believe her.
Name: Book 16

text: Ill keep an eye out for him.
Name: Book 16

text: I think he tried to have me killed in the hospital.
Name: Book 16

text: She holds up a hand to stop me before I get started.
Name: Book 16

text: That son of a bitch tried to turn me into his plaything.
Name: Book 16

text: I was going to kill you and lord knows who else.
Name: Book 16

text: He belongs to me.
Name: Book 16

text: All right, have it your way.
Name: Book 16

text: Do you mind if I crash here tonight.
Name: Book 16

text: Not at all, safety in numbers.
Name: Book 16

text: Her couch was just big enough to me to stretch out on.
Name: Book 16

text: She would have let me sleep in her bed if I had asked.
Name: Book 16

text: Somehow, I dont think I would have gotten any rest.
Name: Book 16

text: It wouldnt be because we would have done something.
Name: Book 16

text: I would have spent most of the night questioning my sanity instead of getting any sleep.
Name: Book 16

text: Were past the point of being lovers, no matter how much she flirts with me.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva is a friend, one of my better ones.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats enough for the both of us.
Name: Book 16

text: At least, that is what I keep telling myself.
Name: Book 16

text: It is well past noon when I wake up.
Name: Book 16

text: Nerva is nowhere to be found, not even a note to say where she has gone.
Name: Book 16

text: I try not to worry about it.
Name: Book 16

text: Shes a big girl and can take care of herself.
Name: Book 16

text: I shower and clean up as best I can before heading home.
Name: Book 16

text: Once more, I am forced to take it slow and easy.
Name: Book 16

text: My crutches didnt survive last nights scuffle.
Name: Book 16

text: Luckily, I have no trouble catching a cab back uptown.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino is waiting for me outside of my apartment building.
Name: Book 16

text: Her expression is guarded.
Name: Book 16

text: It doesnt betray her thoughts.
Name: Book 16

text: I wonder why she is here until I remember the ring in my pocket.
Name: Book 16

text: Let me guess, you need my help.
Name: Book 16

text: I move past her, continuing inside.
Name: Book 16

text: If Meredith has made his move, I dont have time for these people.
Name: Book 16

text: A touch of color appears on her cheeks.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not about to apologize for doing my job but this is important.
Name: Book 16

text: The urgency in her voice stops me.
Name: Book 16

text: Against my better judgment, I relent.
Name: Book 16

text: Okay, lets talk inside.
Name: Book 16

text: After I make some coffee for us, I settle down to hear the bad news.
Name: Book 16

text: She just holds the cup as if she were drawing warmth from it.
Name: Book 16

text: You have to understand, this is all so new to us.
Name: Book 16

text: We didnt go to Meredith, he came to us.
Name: Book 16

text: It was right after the incident.
Name: Book 16

text: We were still trying to figure out what had happened.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith told us you and your friends were responsible for letting that thing loose.
Name: Book 16

text: I didnt believe him but he did a good job of convincing my superiors this was at least partially your fault.
Name: Book 16

text: Every good story and great lie has an element of truth to it.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not sure how much truth was in Merediths tale.
Name: Book 16

text: The guilt I had been suppressing rose to the surface.
Name: Book 16

text: Was I really partially to blame for this.
Name: Book 16

text: A lot of people died and I could be the one responsible for it.
Name: Book 16

text: No, I might have caused the building to fall but its not my fault that thing got loose.
Name: Book 16

text: Im just not sure what.
Name: Book 16

text: And what do you think.
Name: Book 16

text: I think you had nothing to do with that creature getting free.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith had convinced Andrew to give him your ring so he could cast a spell to imprison it again.
Name: Book 16

text: According to him, it had to be cast in a certain place at a certain time.
Name: Book 16

text: My words are angry and bitter.
Name: Book 16

text: And after what I told you people, you let him.
Name: Book 16

text: I was against it.
Name: Book 16

text: Marinos words reflect my heat.
Name: Book 16

text: She holds my gaze, not backing down.
Name: Book 16

text: I concede the point, looking down into my own cup.
Name: Book 16

text: I told them it was stupid.
Name: Book 16

text: We should at least consult with another expert in the field but there was no time.
Name: Book 16

text: They wanted to have this wrapped up quickly.
Name: Book 16

text: She takes a deep breath before answering.
Name: Book 16

text: Whatever Meredith tried to do, it didnt work.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats when the ring vanished.
Name: Book 16

text: We all knew he was criminally insane but this.
Name: Book 16

text: It went beyond anything we had seen.
Name: Book 16

text: And thats when you tried to take him to a padded room.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats when it showed up, the Servitor.
Name: Book 16

text: He was in control of it the whole time.
Name: Book 16

text: He was the one that let it loose from the building.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know why he didnt have it break him out of jail.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know what causes her to shake.
Name: Book 16

text: It could be the horror of the situation or the fact she and her co-workers were used.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats the problem when you sleep with the devil, you get burned.
Name: Book 16

text: When Marino is able to speak again, I realize it is a combination of emotions that haunt her.
Name: Book 16

text: He laughed about how we had all played into his hands.
Name: Book 16

text: All of those people dead and he laughed.
Name: Book 16

text: I heard the speech before.
Name: Book 16

text: Let me guess, he got away.
Name: Book 16

text: Yes, we didnt have anything to stop that thing.
Name: Book 16

text: It killed almost everyone.
Name: Book 16

text: I barely got out of there.
Name: Book 16

text: She pauses again, setting aside the coffee.
Name: Book 16

text: Is this the world you live in.
Name: Book 16

text: Is this what you deal with.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino is hurt and shaken.
Name: Book 16

text: It is obvious she has lost a lot of friends and co- workers.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know anything I can say that will make her feel better.
Name: Book 16

text: I settle for the truth.
Name: Book 16

text: Ill help you get him.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not about to let him turn the world into an abattoir.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino stays with me the rest of the day and well into the night.
Name: Book 16

text: She doesnt want to go even though she should.
Name: Book 16

text: There is work to be done.
Name: Book 16

text: She has to file a report about what happened.
Name: Book 16

text: Theres a manhunt to arrange.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith is a fugitive and she wants him brought in.
Name: Book 16

text: As a favor to me, she stays at my place doing as much as she can from here.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not the most efficient arrangement and her superiors might have questions for her.
Name: Book 16

text: I havent told her what its about.
Name: Book 16

text: I only mention its important.
Name: Book 16

text: I can tell the cryptic answer annoys her.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats better than being shell shocked.
Name: Book 16

text: Im still a little worried about her.
Name: Book 16

text: Meredith exposed her to the darker side of magic.
Name: Book 16

text: I need to show her the other side of things.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont want her or her superiors getting the idea all magic is evil.
Name: Book 16

text: Its obvious the DIA doesnt know much about this sort of thing.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont want them to launch a modern day witch hunt or inquisition.
Name: Book 16

text: I stay out of Marinos way until it is just before midnight.
Name: Book 16

text: Its almost that time, I say.
Name: Book 16

text: Time to begin your education.
Name: Book 16

text: I grab my coat and open the door for her.
Name: Book 16

text: It takes her a few minutes to gather her things.
Name: Book 16

text: Instead of heading downstairs, we go up to the roof.
Name: Book 16

text: I can see the mixture of curiosity and suspicion at war on her features.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino has good reason to be suspicious after what she had been through.
Name: Book 16

text: She glossed over the details but I had seen the Servitors handiwork.
Name: Book 16

text: Being present while it slaughtered everyone in sight is something I dont want to think about.
Name: Book 16

text: It would do things to anyones head.
Name: Book 16

text: Finally, she asks, What are we doing up here.
Name: Book 16

text: Nothing bad is going to happen.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino cant feel it yet.
Name: Book 16

text: That will change soon.
Name: Book 16

text: I take the remaining time to explain a few things to her.
Name: Book 16

text: There is a time when magic is at its strongest.
Name: Book 16

text: Its called the Witching Hour.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats at midnight isnt it.
Name: Book 16

text: It is and it isnt.
Name: Book 16

text: The name is a bit misleading.
Name: Book 16

text: The amount of time varies.
Name: Book 16

text: A lot depends on the stars, the sun and the moon.
Name: Book 16

text: At the height of a full moon, the witching hour can last up to three hours.
Name: Book 16

text: On nights with no moon, it might only be a few minutes.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino nods, not realizing what this has to do with her and why we are here.
Name: Book 16

text: I point to the east, in the direction of Central Park.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not visible from our vantage point.
Name: Book 16

text: The buildings between us and the Park form a wall that hides it from view.
Name: Book 16

text: What are you doing.
Name: Book 16

text: she asks.
Name: Book 16

text: The world changes yet it remains the same.
Name: Book 16

text: The laws of nature relax, loosening their hold.
Name: Book 16

text: This is the Witching Hour.
Name: Book 16

text: Her exposure to Meredith and his magic made her sensitive to the shift.
Name: Book 16

text: It does the same to everyone who is exposed to magic.
Name: Book 16

text: Some dont realize what it is they sense.
Name: Book 16

text: Those that realize something special is happening have a choice to make.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not an easy one and there is no turning back once you make the decision.
Name: Book 16

text: You can choose to enter the supernatural world or turn your back upon it.
Name: Book 16

text: Almost no one takes the third option.
Name: Book 16

text: Only a select few choose to walk in both worlds; the natural and the supernatural.
Name: Book 16

text: The price for doing so is it that youre not fully a part of either world.
Name: Book 16

text: Its the path I chose.
Name: Book 16

text: When I talk to most people about magic and the supernatural, they look at me like I am crazy.
Name: Book 16

text: Its why I couldnt go back to my old life, I had changed too much.
Name: Book 16

text: I can fit in and walk among the supernatural but at the end of the day Im still only human no matter what I have seen and can do.
Name: Book 16

text: Would I trade that away.
Name: Book 16

text: No, its what makes me who I am, so I walk this tightrope, making my own world that is a mix of the two, a world that Meredith has placed in grave danger.
Name: Book 16

text: There arent many Fae left in the world.
Name: Book 16

text: Few call the city their home.
Name: Book 16

text: Those that do, live within or near Central Park.
Name: Book 16

text: By the light of the stars and moon, they gather.
Name: Book 16

text: Faerie fire erupts over Central Park.
Name: Book 16

text: It is lost to all those not attuned or able to sense the Witching Hour.
Name: Book 16

text: Im used to the spectacle.
Name: Book 16

text: Its something I take for granted until I look up into the night sky during the Witching Hour.
Name: Book 16

text: It is a thing of beauty, the embodiment of their commitment to their home.
Name: Book 16

text: When Marino recovers from the sight, we descend to the city streets.
Name: Book 16

text: When I walked with Kara before my confrontation with Meredith, I avoided all the places where I might run into my friends.
Name: Book 16

text: I also took pains to avoid any supernatural types.
Name: Book 16

text: This time, I seek them out.
Name: Book 16

text: I give Marino a tour of my world, taking her to the more magical places of the city.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not always pretty.
Name: Book 16

text: To do this right, I have to show the good with the bad so she can make an informed decision.
Name: Book 16

text: At Lincoln Center, a street magician performs real magic disguising it as simple illusion and parlor tricks for the crowds leaving the opera house.
Name: Book 16

text: We laugh as sprites soar and buzz around the oblivious skaters on the ice at Rockefeller Center.
Name: Book 16

text: On Canal Street near the Manhattan Bridge, I point out a troll accosting passer bys for change.
Name: Book 16

text: At the South Street Seaport, a siren sings her song.
Name: Book 16

text: And so it goes.
Name: Book 16

text: It is close to sunrise when we return to the roof of my building.
Name: Book 16

text: I wonder what Kara is doing right now.
Name: Book 16

text: There were nights when we did nothing but look up at the stars together.
Name: Book 16

text: Now it feels like I pissed all that away.
Name: Book 16

text: Jennifer touches my arm.
Name: Book 16

text: She looks to the east and the first rays of the sun, taking a deep breath.
Name: Book 16

text: Some of the horror has been washed away.
Name: Book 16

text: She still looks bewildered.
Name: Book 16

text: Theres a lot to process.
Name: Book 16

text: She has a lot of choices to make in the coming days.
Name: Book 16

text: I see what you mean, Count.
Name: Book 16

text: She smiles impishly, an expression Ive never seen her use before.
Name: Book 16

text: Its something I had to experience firsthand.
Name: Book 16

text: And you see and do this every day.
Name: Book 16

text: Not every day, but this is my world, the world between.
Name: Book 16

text: If youre serious about wanting to learn about the supernatural, the price tag can be a bit high.
Name: Book 16

text: Its up to you.
Name: Book 16

text: Once you decide, there is no going back.
Name: Book 16

text: She leans closer, close enough for me to feel her warmth.
Name: Book 16

text: Will I be able to work magic.
Name: Book 16

text: Yes, probably to some degree.
Name: Book 16

text: Can you work magic.
Name: Book 16

text: Not really, I cant touch it.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont understand, she says.
Name: Book 16

text: I smile, resisting the urge to slip my arm around her.
Name: Book 16

text: The one that does isnt speaking to me right now.
Name: Book 16

text: Marino nods, perhaps hearing something in my voice.
Name: Book 16

text: She murmurs, Thank you.
Name: Book 16

text: We stand there as the stars flee the dawn, enjoying what could be a romantic moment.
Name: Book 16

text: Her lips are dangerously close and like I fool I dont take advantage of the situation.
Name: Book 16

text: Im as human as the next person but I just cant do it.
Name: Book 16

text: It wouldnt be fair to her or Kara, no matter how tempting.
Name: Book 16

text: Instead, we just enjoy the sunrise and each others' company.
Name: Book 16

text: Teachers and professors are a strange and wonderful lot.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont mean the ones who see it as just another job.
Name: Book 16

text: Im talking about the dedicated ones.
Name: Book 16

text: The rare ones you remember years later because of the lessons they taught you, even the ones not part of the curriculum.
Name: Book 16

text: My physics teacher was one of those individuals.
Name: Book 16

text: He was a man of science who still had the passion of an explorer and the soul of a philosopher.
Name: Book 16

text: His lessons were eye opening.
Name: Book 16

text: You always left his class thinking, not just about science, but about life and the way things worked.
Name: Book 16

text: If he had a religion, it was education.
Name: Book 16

text: He saw it as his duty to teach his students not only the subject matter but how to learn on their own.
Name: Book 16

text: On the first day of class, he gave us all a warning.
Name: Book 16

text: A closed mind, whether its yours or someone elses, is a dangerous thing.
Name: Book 16

text: It breeds intolerance and makes you unreceptive to new ideas.
Name: Book 16

text: In his opinion, it has led to more trouble than anything else in this day and age.
Name: Book 16

text: That sounded pretty accurate to me, especially now.
Name: Book 16

text: An open mind is a prerequisite in my line of work.
Name: Book 16

text: It also fits with my style.
Name: Book 16

text: I like to look at things from different angles.
Name: Book 16

text: Sometimes I can see things from someone elses point of view.
Name: Book 16

text: Its helped me solve a lot of problems and avoid potential trouble.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats not to say I dont have my stubborn moments, but I try to be flexible and leave room for being wrong.
Name: Book 16

text: Being a teacher is a new role for me.
Name: Book 16

text: Scott or Sol could probably do a better job at it than me, but its not their responsibility.
Name: Book 16

text: I took it upon myself to re-introduce Jennifer to the supernatural.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant just let her stumble along blindly or foist her off on someone else.
Name: Book 16

text: It wouldnt be right.
Name: Book 16

text: So I struggle to pass on the lessons I learned while trying not to bore the hell out of her.
Name: Book 16

text: It helps that I enjoy spending time with Jennifer.
Name: Book 16

text: Shes a fast learner and always full of questions.
Name: Book 16

text: Later when she is ready to learn actual magic, Ill see that she gets a good teacher.
Name: Book 16

text: For now, shes my responsibility.
Name: Book 16

text: Tonight, there isnt much to talk about except magic.
Name: Book 16

text: Our efforts to track down Meredith have been fruitless.
Name: Book 16

text: Im about to make myself a drink when Jennifer brings up the Bloodstone.
Name: Book 16

text: You never told me how you got the ring from Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: It just appeared on my desk.
Name: Book 16

text: Jennifer is about to say, Thats impossible.
Name: Book 16

text: Instead, she just smiles ruefully.
Name: Book 16

text: Her world has gotten a bit more complicated now that magic is a part of it.
Name: Book 16

text: It will take some time for her to make the adjustment.
Name: Book 16

text: There is had to be a reason someone sent you the ring.
Name: Book 16

text: Jennifer has made a lot of progress over the last week.
Name: Book 16

text: She thinks someone must have used magic to take the ring from Meredith and send it to me.
Name: Book 16

text: There is another possibility.
Name: Book 16

text: It could have come to me on its own.
Name: Book 16

text: The Bloodstone might be attuned to me.
Name: Book 16

text: I was told no one would be able to use it but me if that happened.
Name: Book 16

text: Where did you get it from anyway.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a long story, I say.
Name: Book 16

text: Arent they all.
Name: Book 16

text: she replies.
Name: Book 16

text: As a child, I never spent as much time in Van Cortlandt Park as I would have liked.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though it was in the same borough, it was far enough away to make travel there inconvenient.
Name: Book 16

text: It wasnt the largest or most famous park in the city.
Name: Book 16

text: It didnt need those honors.
Name: Book 16

text: From its winding forested trails to its wide open fields, Van Cortlandt Park is a place of marvels.
Name: Book 16

text: You never had to look hard to find something to do, especially at this time of year.
Name: Book 16

text: Its the end of spring and the beginning of summer.
Name: Book 16

text: On a nearby field, the Big Apple Circus is putting up their big top and preparing to entertain the masses.
Name: Book 16

text: I keep promising myself to catch their show.
Name: Book 16

text: Sadly, its one of those promises I always break.
Name: Book 16

text: As we leave the parade grounds behind, Karas thoughts touch me across the link bringing a smile to my face.
Name: Book 16

text: Youre in a good mood.
Name: Book 16

text: Why shouldnt I be in one.
Name: Book 16

text: Things have been going our way.
Name: Book 16

text: Im doing okay in my new line of work.
Name: Book 16

text: I got to save a damsel in distress.
Name: Book 16

text: What could go wrong.
Name: Book 16

text: She doesnt reply immediately.
Name: Book 16

text: We both know I got lucky that time.
Name: Book 16

text: It could have been a lot worse if Hagan wasnt there.
Name: Book 16

text: The bouncer at the Jesse James, and self proclaimed immortal, drew a lot of fire.
Name: Book 16

text: Together, we managed to solve Wendys little stalker problem.
Name: Book 16

text: If I had been there by myself, I would most likely be dead.
Name: Book 16

text: I have no illusions about my ability to fight off a bar full of people looking to rip me apart.
Name: Book 16

text: Since that night, I have been a bit more careful as I learned the trade.
Name: Book 16

text: There was a lot to pick up.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though Kara wont say it, she thinks I am making excellent progress.
Name: Book 16

text: Yes, but dont let it go to your head.
Name: Book 16

text: One of the leading causes of death in this business, besides blind stupidity, is overconfidence.
Name: Book 16

text: Its why Sol asked me to accompany Timothy on this little gig.
Name: Book 16

text: Sol didnt get the title Solomon the Wise because he took unnecessary chances.
Name: Book 16

text: Its his knowledge that comes from experience which makes him a master at his craft.
Name: Book 16

text: Sometimes I take it for granted.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes my friend first and sorcerer second.
Name: Book 16

text: Today, I am on Sols payroll.
Name: Book 16

text: My partner has more experience than me as a paranormal investigator but he lacks my little talent, not to mention Kara's brilliant insight and welcome companionship.
Name: Book 16

text: I am about to reply to Kara when Timothy ruins the moment by speaking.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not what he says but how he says it.
Name: Book 16

text: Let me handle this, Count.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know what he thinks Im here for, but its not to take orders.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe he thinks, Ill just slow him down or cramp his style.
Name: Book 16

text: Either way, Im not having it.
Name: Book 16

text: Is follow your lead massa.
Name: Book 16

text: Are you trying to be funny.
Name: Book 16

text: he asks.
Name: Book 16

text: Youre quick, I like that.
Name: Book 16

text: One of these days, well have to work on your people skills.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy frowns as he turns to face me.
Name: Book 16

text: Look, Im allowing you to tag along as a favor to my employers.
Name: Book 16

text: And here I thought it was because your employers wanted you to have some backup.
Name: Book 16

text: Lets just get this over with.
Name: Book 16

text: Ill follow your lead, but keep the orders to a minimum.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy mutters something too quiet for me to catch.
Name: Book 16

text: It is enough to dispel Karas good humor.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont like or trust him,    Kara says.
Name: Book 16

text: Neither does Sol.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats why were here.
Name: Book 16

text: What I get in return is the equivalent of a mental nod.
Name: Book 16

text: Just be careful.
Name: Book 16

text: He doesnt care about you.
Name: Book 16

text: I would be worried if he did.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats not funny.
Name: Book 16

text: You know what I mean.
Name: Book 16

text: Yeah, I do.
Name: Book 16

text: I give Timothy the once over again.
Name: Book 16

text: He seems like an okay guy but I dont think we will ever be buddy buddy.
Name: Book 16

text: He was dead set against me accompanying him.
Name: Book 16

text: It couldnt have been about the money.
Name: Book 16

text: Hell, I could care less about it.
Name: Book 16

text: Im here because Sol asked me to be.
Name: Book 16

text: More importantly, I wanted to see this through.
Name: Book 16

text: When I helped out Wendy with her stalker, I stumbled onto a much bigger situation.
Name: Book 16

text: Her stalker was using a powerful magic item to try and charm her.
Name: Book 16

text: He wasnt the only one, weeks later another item turned up in the hands of a cat burglar.
Name: Book 16

text: Contrary to popular belief, powerful magic items arent all that common.
Name: Book 16

text: There are three classes of magic items.
Name: Book 16

text: The first is used by spellcasters to help them work magic.
Name: Book 16

text: They can take many forms, though a majority resembles your stereotypical magic wands and staves of power.
Name: Book 16

text: The second are those items enchanted to work a particular effect.
Name: Book 16

text: Potions and charms fall into this category and, like the first type, their form can vary.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive seen gems that hold a spell and scrolls that could be read to produce a magical effect.
Name: Book 16

text: In these cases, the magic can only be used once before the item is either consumed or drained of power.
Name: Book 16

text: I like to call the last type, 'Class Three.
Name: Book 16

text: These items are imbued with a lasting or permanent effect.
Name: Book 16

text: Their powers and strength vary.
Name: Book 16

text: Some, like Excalibur, are the stuff of legends.
Name: Book 16

text: To make these types of items requires a lot of time, effort and skill.
Name: Book 16

text: With magic the way it is, only the most skilled practitioners can create such items.
Name: Book 16

text: Even so, none can match the power of the items created in the early days.
Name: Book 16

text: Any truly powerful item you come across was more than likely made a very long time ago.
Name: Book 16

text: It was these items that were turning up.
Name: Book 16

text: When these things turn up in such quantities, people get a little concerned.
Name: Book 16

text: Especially when they start to fall into what Sol likes to call the wrong hands.
Name: Book 16

text: That usually means anyones hands but his and a few close personal friends.
Name: Book 16

text: In this case, I found myself agreeing with him.
Name: Book 16

text: As Sol searched for where these items were coming from, I worked with Hagan and others in the business to confiscate the more dangerous and powerful items.
Name: Book 16

text: After weeks of hard work, we had done just that.
Name: Book 16

text: The only thing left to do was to check out the place where they had all come from.
Name: Book 16

text: I would have felt better with Hagan here but as he put it, there was no glory to be had crawling around in a cave.
Name: Book 16

text: Instead, Timothy was hired by one of Sols associates to take Hagans place.
Name: Book 16

text: The park is far from being unexplored but there are parts of it that see little if any traffic.
Name: Book 16

text: Out here on the back trails and in the hills, it feels like youre no longer in the city.
Name: Book 16

text: It was here I would hike and explore.
Name: Book 16

text: All the while, I imagined I was some brave explorer seeking adventure in some far away land.
Name: Book 16

text: Occasionally, the city sounds or noise from the highway would dispel the illusion as I hiked through the park.
Name: Book 16

text: Today, I am back on those same trails with Timothy.
Name: Book 16

text: This is my turf even though I have not been here in years.
Name: Book 16

text: It takes us some time to find the trail marker we are looking for and to get our bearings.
Name: Book 16

text: From there, its a long walk to the edge of the park that borders Westchester County and Yonkers.
Name: Book 16

text: Here, the park takes on a different feel.
Name: Book 16

text: The forested trail becomes more ominous while the hills seem more daunting.
Name: Book 16

text: Garbage blown in from elsewhere litters the trails.
Name: Book 16

text: This is a part of the park I never visited in my youth and for good reason.
Name: Book 16

text: There is danger here.
Name: Book 16

text: Back then, it was only muggers and pedophiles I feared but now I can sense something else.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara and Timothy feel it too.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe, it was a good idea to bring backup after all, Timothy says.
Name: Book 16

text: Karas words mirror my own thoughts,    I wish we hadnt come here.
Name: Book 16

text: I frown as we find the cave.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not much more than a jagged crack in the side of a rock face.
Name: Book 16

text: Uninviting and hazardous, it is not the sort of place I would enter if given a choice in the matter.
Name: Book 16

text: Remember what I said about following your lead.
Name: Book 16

text: That means you get to go in first, I say.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy doesnt bother trying to hide the sarcasm.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant blame him but I am not about to go in there first.
Name: Book 16

text: If you want to play leader, you should lead from the front.
Name: Book 16

text: At least, we both came prepared.
Name: Book 16

text: With flashlights in hand, we move closer to the crack.
Name: Book 16

text: Our feeble lights do little to pierce the gloom and doom that awaits us.
Name: Book 16

text: One of these days, Im going to have to invest in a Maglite and some glow sticks for this sort of occasion.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy navigates the jagged opening, careful to avoid the sharp rocks tailor made to snag on his clothing or rip skin.
Name: Book 16

text: Any idea whats inside.
Name: Book 16

text: The question is meant for Kara but I get an answer from Timothy that doesnt help my piece of mind.
Name: Book 16

text: You better get in here.
Name: Book 16

text: I turn sideways to make entering a bit easier.
Name: Book 16

text: Its still slow going.
Name: Book 16

text: When I step into the cavern, I wish I had remained outside.
Name: Book 16

text: Its bigger than I thought it would be, extending down and into the hill.
Name: Book 16

text: Without a doubt, this place is the source of the magic items we have been recovering.
Name: Book 16

text: The broken coffers and open chests dont seem nearly as important as the scorch marks on the floor and walls.
Name: Book 16

text: The charred remains off to the side of the opening is nothing more than a pile of blacken bones twisted in a pattern that only dying in agony can produce.
Name: Book 16

text: I nearly miss the pedestal of black stone that sits at the far end of the cave.
Name: Book 16

text: A golden ring catches the light, calling attention to itself amid the darkness.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy is already crossing the room to the ring while I stare at the corpse.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not the first time I have seen death.
Name: Book 16

text: Its something I hope I will never get used to.
Name: Book 16

text: Who is Mr.
Name: Book 16

text: Crispy.
Name: Book 16

text: Karas warning answers one of my questions.
Name: Book 16

text: There is a spirit here,    she says.
Name: Book 16

text: Like a ghost.
Name: Book 16

text: There are many different kinds of spirits.
Name: Book 16

text: If a spirit did all of this, it is definitely not friendly.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy is almost to the pedestal when I call out.
Name: Book 16

text: There is a spirit here.
Name: Book 16

text: Use your head, Count.
Name: Book 16

text: Its probably a ghost.
Name: Book 16

text: If we can get it to manifest, we can learn about this place.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara is shocked into silence while I just stare at Timothy as if he had announced his intentions to go screw my sister.
Name: Book 16

text: His line of reasoning is flawed.
Name: Book 16

text: If he is correct, it would be a fast and easy way to get some answers but that is a big if.
Name: Book 16

text: The spirit could be the ghost of Mr.
Name: Book 16

text: Crispy or something else.
Name: Book 16

text: It also assumes the spirit is willing and able to communicate with us.
Name: Book 16

text: I think we are dealing with an elemental or worse.
Name: Book 16

text: My sudden exclamation and justified panic doesnt stop Timothy.
Name: Book 16

text: Hes made up his mind and set his course.
Name: Book 16

text: He doesnt quite shout but he speaks loud enough to be heard throughout the cave.
Name: Book 16

text: We see that you died in a fire.
Name: Book 16

text: Want to talk about it.
Name: Book 16

text: How did it feel.
Name: Book 16

text: What the hell are you thinking.
Name: Book 16

text: I sense rather than hear Karas sharp intake of breath.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant even imagine the look on my face.
Name: Book 16

text: I know provoking a spirit is an effective method to get a response.
Name: Book 16

text: The problem is the response is usually not a positive one.
Name: Book 16

text: True to form, the booming titanic laughter that bounces off the walls of the cave proves my point.
Name: Book 16

text: Hagan would love this.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara forces herself to remain calm.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a demon.
Name: Book 16

text: I am sorely tempted to say something smart but that would mean using my brain power for something other than getting out of here with my skin and soul intact.
Name: Book 16

text: Its guarding the ring on the pedestal.
Name: Book 16

text: Okay, that explains why the ring is still here while the rest of the room has been ransacked.
Name: Book 16

text: It could have cared less about the rest of the stuff in here, as long as the ring was untouched.
Name: Book 16

text: An icy hand threatens to pull out my lungs as I mull that thought over.
Name: Book 16

text: That other stuff we traced here were all Class Three items.
Name: Book 16

text: That ring, whatever it is, must be uniquely dangerous and powerful.
Name: Book 16

text: I move a little closer to Timothy, who is also getting over his surprise.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: What galls me about this whole thing is the way he is looking at me.
Name: Book 16

text: His expression shouts, This is your fault.
Name: Book 16

text: We need to spread out.
Name: Book 16

text: Thats no ghost He says.
Name: Book 16

text: Shut the hell up.
Name: Book 16

text: The laughter continues, though nothing takes form or shape.
Name: Book 16

text: There is just a presence that means to do us great bodily harm.
Name: Book 16

text: When it speaks, its voice is tinged with amusement.
Name: Book 16

text: The tone reminds me of a young boy about to pluck the wings off of a butterfly so he can take his time frying it under a magnifying glass.
Name: Book 16

text: There is no thought given to how the butterfly might feel, just his own sadistic pleasure.
Name: Book 16

text: You are here for one of three reasons.
Name: Book 16

text: All carry the same consequences.
Name: Book 16

text: Since neither one of you appears to be priests, we can rule out the first.
Name: Book 16

text: The second is that you have come here by accident.
Name: Book 16

text: That is most unfortunate for you but a welcome diversion from my boring vigil.
Name: Book 16

text: The last and most likely possibility is that you have come for Bloodstone.
Name: Book 16

text: In which case, I get to mix business with pleasure.
Name: Book 16

text: Ill ask Kara about that later when I am not busy thinking about how much pain a demons pleasure can inflict on me.
Name: Book 16

text: What I need right now is some advice on how to deal with this thing when she calls out another warning.
Name: Book 16

text: There is a rush of power.
Name: Book 16

text: My skin feels painfully warm as if I am standing too close to a bonfire but I dont burst into flames like the rest of the cavern.
Name: Book 16

text: My talent saves me from an agonizing death.
Name: Book 16

text: It also saves Timothy as I redirect the magic away from us.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a useful gift for an aspiring paranormal investigator.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara yells    We need to get out of here.
Name: Book 16

text: It seems one of you has a bit of power.
Name: Book 16

text: This might make things interesting, The demon says.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont know how interesting that will be.
Name: Book 16

text: I need to get out of here.
Name: Book 16

text: If I stick around much longer, Im a dead man.
Name: Book 16

text: My gift, as I like to call it, doesnt have any major downsides, but it does have its limits.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive learned it can protect me against all but the strongest of magic.
Name: Book 16

text: That came in handy when me and Hagan were confiscating all those magic items but I also found out it is useless against the byproducts and side effects of a spell.
Name: Book 16

text: Smoke from a magical fire as it consumes the chests and other flammable material in the cave can still suffocate me.
Name: Book 16

text: Air heated to extreme temperatures by those same flames can still burn my lungs.
Name: Book 16

text: Its enough for me to forget about Timothy.
Name: Book 16

text: Hell have to fend for himself while I rack my brains for a way out of this.
Name: Book 16

text: Who am I kidding.
Name: Book 16

text: Well never make it out the crack and into fresh air.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant even see because of all the smoke and fire.
Name: Book 16

text: In between hacking coughs, Timothy barks something out in a language I dont understand.
Name: Book 16

text: I take in a lung full of bad air.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara screams something and so does Timothy but it is the demon whose words I hear.
Name: Book 16

text: I can barely make out the smoke and fire coalescing briefly into a humanoid shape.
Name: Book 16

text: As I choke and cough, it surges and flows into Timothys form.
Name: Book 16

text: There isnt anything nice or good about this development.
Name: Book 16

text: Kara growls,    That fool.
Name: Book 16

text: I turn my thoughts inward now that I am no long in danger of dying in the next few seconds.
Name: Book 16

text: The smoke and flames disappear from the cavern as suddenly as they had appeared.
Name: Book 16

text: I can breathe again.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not angry or annoyed at Kara, far from it.
Name: Book 16

text: Its just that near death experiences really put me on edge.
Name: Book 16

text: He made a pact with that thing.
Name: Book 16

text: What do you mean a pact.
Name: Book 16

text: You mean like a deal with the devil.
Name: Book 16

text: This unexpected development has put her in a foul mood and my questions arent helping.
Name: Book 16

text: I direct my next one at Timothy.
Name: Book 16

text: What did you do.
Name: Book 16

text: He doesnt try to lie.
Name: Book 16

text: We both know what hes done.
Name: Book 16

text: I did what I had to.
Name: Book 16

text: It was that or die.
Name: Book 16

text: I open my mouth and then close it.
Name: Book 16

text: There is no point in trying to argue with him.
Name: Book 16

text: It wont change a thing.
Name: Book 16

text: Whats done is done.
Name: Book 16

text: Its his next statement that nearly causes me to punch him out, demonic pact or no.
Name: Book 16

text: You would have done the same thing if you knew how.
Name: Book 16

text: Not bloody likely, I growl.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy takes a step back from the truth and hostility in my words.
Name: Book 16

text: Maybe, his bargain allows him to see me in a new light.
Name: Book 16

text: Youre not one to judge.
Name: Book 16

text: I am a reflection of you, Count.
Name: Book 16

text: We are both bound to higher powers.
Name: Book 16

text: There isnt much difference between us.
Name: Book 16

text: Its a rhetorical question.
Name: Book 16

text: You cant get much more serious than this.
Name: Book 16

text: I call Kara my guardian angel but in truth, I dont know who she is or where she comes from.
Name: Book 16

text: She could be a spirit or any number of things.
Name: Book 16

text: What is important is that she cares for me and deep down I know beyond a shadow of a doubt she would never try to control me.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont, I cant possess you,    She says and I believe her.
Name: Book 16

text: Whatever choices I make are my own.
Name: Book 16

text: Im just glad youre here for me when I need you.
Name: Book 16

text: Aloud, I say, You dont know what youre talking about so Ill let that slide.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy shrugs away my words and glare.
Name: Book 16

text: He is correct about one thing.
Name: Book 16

text: Like it or not, he is a reflection of me, backwards.
Name: Book 16

text: On the surface, there might be similarities but it ends once you take a closer look.
Name: Book 16

text: Look, maybe we could have found a way to beat him, maybe not.
Name: Book 16

text: At least, this way we all come out ahead.
Name: Book 16

text: Well then, you'll have no problem with me claiming the Bloodstone.
Name: Book 16

text: His expression shifts and changes too fast to be that of what I would call a sane man or someone totally in control of himself.
Name: Book 16

text: For a moment, I think I will have a fight on my hands.
Name: Book 16

text: I find myself almost hoping for one when whatever internal debate or struggle there was ends.
Name: Book 16

text: It is yours if you can take it but I wouldnt touch it.
Name: Book 16

text: Its power is dangerous to ones such as us.
Name: Book 16

text: And if I insist.
Name: Book 16

text: It is your life to toss away.
Name: Book 16

text: I didnt know if it was Timothy speaking or his partner.
Name: Book 16

text: His words gave me pause.
Name: Book 16

text: You dont assign a demon to guard something unless its valuable, dangerous, powerful, or all of the above but there was no way I was going to just leave it here.
Name: Book 16

text: Its safe for you.
Name: Book 16

text: Take it,    Kara says.
Name: Book 16

text: And that was that.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy ignored me as I made my way over to the pedestal.
Name: Book 16

text: He had some adjustments to make and things to discuss with his new partner.
Name: Book 16

text: I left him to it though Kara kept a close watch on him in case they tried anything.
Name: Book 16

text: Up close, the ring didnt look like much.
Name: Book 16

text: Made of gold and set with a deep green stone, it looked like any other piece of jewelry.
Name: Book 16

text: The crimson bands were barely visible in the darkness of the cave.
Name: Book 16

text: I reach out to touch the ring.
Name: Book 16

text: There is a strangeness to it that I cant quite identify.
Name: Book 16

text: With effort, I get past the sensation only to hear Kara say the unspeakable.
Name: Book 16

text: The Bloodstone is yours, Count.
Name: Book 16

text: I shake my head as I leave the cave and Timothy behind.
Name: Book 16

text: After this, I want nothing to do with him.
Name: Book 16

text: I wont be alone in that sentiment.
Name: Book 16

text: Sol and many others in the community have a thing about demons and the possessed.
Name: Book 16

text: Most will have nothing to do with Timothy.
Name: Book 16

text: Others might want to kill him.
Name: Book 16

text: The rest might have a use for him but those arent the sort of people I do business with.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not going to keep it.
Name: Book 16

text: Ill turn it over to Sol the first chance that I get.
Name: Book 16

text: He and Scott will know what to do with it.
Name: Book 16

text: I didnt want to admit to Kara or myself but the ring scared me as much as Timothy and his new partner did.
Name: Book 16

text: Jennifer lowers her voice with some effort.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: Like in the Exorcist.
Name: Book 16

text: I pick my words very carefully.
Name: Book 16

text: No matter how I try to explain it, there is no good or delicate way to put it.
Name: Book 16

text: The difference is that hes a willing participant.
Name: Book 16

text: She looks at me as if I had just totaled her brand new car.
Name: Book 16

text: That difference is an important one.
Name: Book 16

text: To exorcise a spirit or a demon from someone, a part of them, no matter how small and frightened, has to want to be free.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothy is quite happy with the deal.
Name: Book 16

text: It is one of the reasons why I dont count him among my friends.
Name: Book 16

text: He isnt the issue.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive been avoiding the real issue, letting myself get distracted.
Name: Book 16

text: I cant afford that luxury any longer.
Name: Book 16

text: Too much has happened that I dont understand.
Name: Book 16

text: There are too many players in this game and the stakes keep going up.
Name: Book 16

text: Jen, I need to call someone.
Name: Book 16

text: Can we pick this up tomorrow.
Name: Book 16

text: As long as its not Timothy, She says.
Name: Book 16

text: Sometimes, it is hard to tell where the man ends and the demon begins.
Name: Book 16

text: Its like the two were made for each other.
Name: Book 16

text: Timothys pact gives him a few advantages over his fellow man while his partner gets to avoid a lot of weaknesses demons and spirits have when it comes to possessing people.
Name: Book 16

text: Dealing with the forces of darkness is one thing.
Name: Book 16

text: Letting them move into your body is a different story.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 16

text: No, I have someone else in mind.
Name: Book 16

text: Someone I trust with my life.
Name: Book 16

text: #  Chapter Twenty One.
Name: Book 16

text: I am alone now.
Name: Book 16

text: The apartment feels so empty.
Name: Book 16

text: Its funny when Kara was with me, I was never alone.
Name: Book 16

text: I had forgotten what it felt like.
Name: Book 16

text: Even when she left, I knew she would always come back to me.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not that we never disagree but this time is different.
Name: Book 16

text: Usually, we patch things up within a day or two at the most.
Name: Book 16

text: This time, there is something more to Karas absence.
Name: Book 16

text: In anger, I crossed a line.
Name: Book 16

text: I miss her and Im not sure how to fix things between the two of us.
Name: Book 16

text: I could just sit and wait.
Name: Book 16

text: Even though waiting isnt one of my strong suits, it would be easy compared to the alternative.
Name: Book 16

text: Its always easier to ignore a problem and let it fester.
Name: Book 16

text: No, I cant do it.
Name: Book 16

text: Wheels are in motion.
Name: Book 16

text: I need to act.
Name: Book 16

text: I rely on Kara a lot.
Name: Book 16

text: Its not a bad thing having someone who is always there to look after you.
Name: Book 16

text: There is a problem when youre totally dependent on someone.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not exactly helpless without her but Im also not at my best.
Name: Book 16

text: From the start, Kara has been teaching me about the supernatural and giving me much needed advice.
Name: Book 16

text: Without her help, I would have died on several occasions but I have always resisted her when it came to learning more about my gift.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive always tried to avoid using it on a conscious level.
Name: Book 16

text: It was easier to make excuses.
Name: Book 16

text: I could solve any problem or case that came my way without having to practice with my talent.
Name: Book 16

text: To be honest, I was having way too much fun living a life of adventure.
Name: Book 16

text: It helped me avoid the truth.
Name: Book 16

text: There is a price for such a gift.
Name: Book 16

text: I was given this power to stop people like Meredith.
Name: Book 16

text: When the time came to do just that, I failed.
Name: Book 16

text: Things might have turned out a lot differently if I was able to use my power to drain the Bloodstone safely.
Name: Book 16

text: I could have dealt with Meredith easily.
Name: Book 16

text: Damn me for a fool.
Name: Book 16

text: A lot of pain and heartbreak could have been avoided.
Name: Book 16

text: So what do I do now that I realize my mistake.
Name: Book 16

text: I dont repeat it.
Name: Book 16

text: To do that and get through this, I need information and advice.
Name: Book 16

text: Not only is she the only one who can help me, I miss her and its time to set things right between us.
Name: Book 16

text: So, whats my first step.
Name: Book 16

text: I need to contact her.
Name: Book 16

text: The only way to do it is via our link.
Name: Book 16

text: Sounds simple but like any first step, it is difficult.
Name: Book 16

text: Ive never used the link to contact her.
Name: Book 16

text: Its always been the other way around.
Name: Book 16

text: Im not even sure if such a thing is possible.
Name: Book 16

text: I know a fair amount about magic and the supernatural but less than nothing about the link and my own talent.
Name: Book 16

text: Lately, Ive been a bad student.
Name: Book 16

text: There were always other things to learn and do.
Name: Book 16

text: I have to change that before my next encounter with Meredith.
Name: Book 16
